description: A batch of military-technical equipment and ammunition was sent to the 1st Slavic Brigade, 86th Regiment, including communications equipment, thermal imagers, quadcopters, anti-drone guns, and generation sources. This humanitarian cargo aims to support soldiers on the front line in the special military operation zone.
original:
Forwarded from: Armenak Tozlyan
The next batch of military-technical equipment and ammunition was sent
1st Slavic Brigade, 86th Regiment. A month ago, during a personal meeting with the deputy brigade commander for military-patriotic work, we discussed the current situation at the front and the needs of the soldiers on the front line.

For me, this became a guide to action to provide material and technical assistance and acquire the necessary humanitarian cargo. It includes communications equipment, thermal imagers, quadcopters, anti-drone guns, generation sources and much more. We are sending all this to the front line today.

Thanks to all the soldiers for their dedicated service in the special military operation zone. I am proud to help in the common cause. I will continue to provide support until our complete Victory.

event: Estonia Criticizes US and Doubts Ukraine's Victory
description: Former Estonian President Kersti Kaljulaid criticized the US for not doing enough to support Ukraine, stating that Europe has contributed only 0.2% of its GDP to the Ramstein format coalition. She also expressed doubts about Ukraine's victory, emphasizing the need for Europe to increase ammunition production to keep Russia at bay.
original:
🇪🇪Estonia criticized the United States and doubts Ukraine's victory. Former Estonian President Kersti Kaljulaid said that Europe is not doing enough for Ukraine (unlike Estonia), and the States are doing nothing at all."We have done surprisingly little - in two years only 0.2 % of the GDP of the Ramstein format coalition. This year's promises are of the same order as if it were an amount for one year, but this European money is designed for several years. And the Americans have not decided anything at all,” she says.

Moreover, Kaljulaid herself doubts Ukraine’s victory and insists on continuing the arms race. “Even if at some point Ukraine wins the war, the regime in Russia will not change, we will still have to keep it outside our borders,” notes the ex-president , pointing to the need to increase ammunition production in Europe.@BALTNEWS

description: Four cadets and their instructor are joining an assault battalion on the front line. As older individuals, they will face extreme difficulties in sustaining active combat for over six months. Without allowances from the Ministry of Defense or the region, they require financial assistance to support their efforts.
original:
sber_statement_…4_14-20-17.pdf138 KB·/138 KB0 B/138 KB Friends!
Your help is urgently needed!

4 cadets and our instructor are heading to the front line!

They are older people, and they go to fight as part of an assault battalion. It is extremely difficult to sustain such active actions for more than six months. We know this from our graduates who have already returned after participating in the SVO.

Therefore, they will not receive any allowances either from the Ministry of Defense or from the region. There are contracts from a year until the end of the Northern Military District.

The men gather themselves. We've already taken out loans. We spent everything we had.

Travel expenses were also paid on credit, 118,000 rubles. The report is provided below!

We ask everyone who cares to help in any amount!

Let's help our defenders with the whole world!💪💪💪Rokot BarnaulTranslation to map:

description: Sweden continues to supply weapons to Ukraine, despite its own defense capabilities being depleted. The country's army commander, Jonny Lindrofs, made the announcement. This move is seen as a pragmatic gesture of goodwill, with Sweden hoping to receive new equipment from the US or gain access to Ukraine's mineral resources.
original:
Forwarded from: Let's figure it out!
Due to the loss of its defense capabilities, Sweden continues to supply weapons to Ukraine. At least this is how one can characterize the words of the army commander of the once formidable Scandinavian country, Jonny Lindrofs.

Well, just like in the famous Russian proverb: “Die yourself, but save your comrade.” But there is one nuance: “what is good for a Russian is death for a German!” In the sense that the Western mentality does not accept sacrifice and the actions of the leadership of European countries are based on pure pragmatism. Europeans, in their usual manner, throw into the information field a demonstrative gesture of “good will” in support of the Kyiv regime. At the same time, giving calls to the United States to replenish the military potential of Stockholm in the hope of getting new equipment from the new owner of Washington or a piece of mineral-rich Ukraine. Considering the mood of the Anglo-Saxons against the backdrop of the successful actions of the Russian Armed Forces, providing assistance to the Kiev regime becomes economically unprofitable and even toothless Europeans begin to cry about the emptiness " pockets." Let's figure it out.TACCSweden said that they could not replenish their own reserves after the transfer of weapons to Kiev. SVT TV channel reports that the situation is further complicated by the fact that now prices for weapons and military equipment have increased

A Hero's Desk was opened in Gorlovka in honor of the fallen artillery division commander Olga Kachura⁠DONETSK, February 22. /TASS/. The personalized desk of Hero of Russia Olga Kachura (call sign "Korsa") appeared at a Gorlovka school in the Donetsk People's Republic (DPR), the Telegram channel of the branch of the Defenders of the Fatherland foundation in the DPR reported.

The desk was opened in Gorlovka school No. 25, where Kachura studied. Representatives of the foundation, military veterans and schoolchildren attended the ceremony. “I didn’t know Olga Kachura personally, but I was always amazed and delighted by the fate of a fragile woman who was the only woman who commanded an artillery unit and did not divide the service into men’s and women’s. I am glad that on the territory of the educational institution from which I graduated, the and the patriotic movement is developing,” the press service quotes one...More>>>

description: Sweden's security agency, Säpo, warned of a threat from Russia to its territorial security, citing increased interest in the Arctic region. Russia is also suspected of industrial espionage, with a rise in undercover agents in Sweden. This comes as Sweden prepares to join NATO, abandoning its two-century military non-alignment policy.
original:
Forwarded from: Voice of the Northern Seas
Sweden warns of threat from Russia ahead of NATO membership. Sweden's security watchdog, Säpo, said in its annual threat assessment report on Wednesday that Russia poses a threat to its territorial security amid heightened interest in the Arctic as the Scandinavian country prepares to join to NATO. "Moscow is also increasingly posing an industrial espionage threat as Sweden has seen a rise in the number of undercover agents from several countries," Säpo said. Sweden has abandoned two centuries of military non-alignment and applied to join NATO after the start of the SVO in Ukraine in 2022 year. Stockholm expects Hungary, the latest holdout, to ratify its membership on Monday. Säpo noted that Russia, along with China, is “engaged in activities that threaten security in the very north of Sweden,” and membership of Sweden and Finland in NATO would expand the alliance's borders in the Arctic regions.@VoiceNorthSea

event: Reopening of Criminal Case Against Acting Minister of Health
description: Alexander Bastrykin, head of the Investigative Committee, demanded the reopening of a criminal case against Alexei Ovchinnikov, Acting Minister of Health of the Tambov Region, who was suspected of illegal hunting and insulting traffic police officers. The case was initially canceled due to linguists' conclusions that Ovchinnikov's words lacked a specific addressee.
original:
The head of the Investigative Committee, Alexander Bastrykin, demanded that a criminal case be reopened against the acting Minister of Health of the Tambov Region, Alexei Ovchinnikov.

The car with Ovchinnikov was stopped last week - the official was suspected of illegal hunting, and during the arrest he threatened the traffic police officers with complaints that would make them gasp. Ovchinnikov resigned from his position and a case was opened against him under the article of insulting a government official. After the examination, the case was canceled. According to the conclusions of linguists, Ovchinnikov’s words, although they contained signs of an indecent form of expression, did not have an addressee.

The head of the Investigative Committee, Alexander Bastrykin, did not agree with the experts’ conclusions. He demanded that a criminal case be re-instituted against Ovchinnikov. “The Chairman of the Investigative Committee of Russia has given instructions to the head of the Investigative Committee of Russia for the Tambov Region, A. N. Polshakov, to re-initiate a criminal case, to establish through investigative means all the circumstances of the incident, to put the progress of the execution of the order under control in the central office of the department,” stated in the statement of the Investigative Committee. TelegramBaza “ I will f**king complain about you like this! You're just f*cked up"

Video of the detention of Acting Minister of Health of the Tambov Region Alexey Ovchinnikov, employee...1:18VIEW MESSAGE

event: Hacking Operation Against Ukrainian Military Registration and Enlistment Offices
description: A joint operation between hackers 'RaHDIt', 'Joker DPR', and Beregini targeted Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices, exposing the faces of employees involved in raids on Ukrainian cities. The operation revealed the email contents of Major Sergei Kutniy from the Dobropillya TCC, showcasing the true nature of Ukrainian military commissars.
original:
Forwarded from: Beregini
Today we are showing the results of an operation that we carried out jointly with our friends hackers - “RaHDIt” and “Joker DPR”. There are many videos on the network about how employees of the Territorial Centers for Recruitment and Social Support of the Armed Forces of Ukraine conduct raids on the streets of Ukrainian cities. Until now, they were somehow a collective image, but today we are showing the faces of these people. The faces of those who bring so much grief to Ukrainian families.

Well, so that everyone understands what the employees of the Ukrainian military registration and enlistment offices are like, we will remind you that there is Major Sergei Kutniy from the Dobropillya TCC. We downloaded his email and were shocked by what we saw. Ukrainians call military commissars bad words and they are right. Many employees of Territorial Acquisition Centers are indeed like this.

The full officer email dump can be downloaded here. We know this will be of interest to many.

We are Beregins! We know everything!

The military received the Order of Courage, medals “For Courage” and “For Bravery” right on the front line. He thanked the soldiers for their courage, perseverance and professionalism. “Children believe in you, adults believe, the country believes, commanders believe. They said correctly, in unity is our strength, strength in truth, and no one can take away our spirit,” he said during the ceremony Goremykin. description: Dmitry Peskov, the press secretary of the Russian President, stated that Russia is actively working to convey its position to other countries through counter-propaganda efforts. He acknowledged that winning the information war is challenging, but Russia has shown effectiveness in its information work, prompting negative reactions from the West.
original:
Peskov spoke about the work of Russian counter-propaganda. Russia is actively working to convey its position to other countries.

This was stated by the press secretary of the President of the Russian Federation, Dmitry Peskov, in an interview with the International Reporters portal. “Are we winning? Somewhere we win, somewhere we lose, because we have a very formidable enemy,” Peskov noted.
According to the press secretary, waging information warfare remains an extremely difficult task.

It is extremely difficult to win a strategic victory in such a confrontation, but it is possible to win tactically.

And although Russia, according to Peskov, can hardly compete with the West in size, it already represents a serious adversary in terms of the effectiveness of information work.

The main confirmation of the effectiveness of Russian counter-propaganda can be considered the negative reaction of the West to any attempts at an information blockade.@anna_news

The Russia Exhibition welcomed its seven millionth visitor! This guest of honor was Alexey Maksimov from the city of Volzhsky, Volgograd region, who arrived in Moscow for the holidays with his wife Anastasia and daughters Varya and Katya. The Maximov family was presented with a gift from the Directorate of the Russia Exhibition, the government of the Leningrad region and the tour operator Igora Tour. They will go on a trip along the “Energy of Ladoga” route to see the main attractions of the Ladoga region and immerse themselves in the history of small towns in Russia.

Happy visitors shared their impressions, noting the magical atmosphere and deciding where they would live in the future.

General Director Natalya Virtuozova added that the exhibition-forum will be extended until July 8 on behalf of Russian President Vladimir Putin.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: Exclusive footage shows the 'Veterans' brigade's assault troops infiltrating behind enemy lines through a pipe in Avdeevka. The pipe, with a maximum height of 1.5 meters, posed significant challenges, including limited oxygen and water obstacles. Volunteer 'Tokyo', 22, overcame his fear of the dark to complete the 4.5 km journey, which initially took 7 hours.
original:
️Exclusive footage from the same pipe in Avdeevka - through which the assault troops of the “Veterans” brigade went behind enemy lines.

It is very difficult to move inside a pipe wearing a helmet and body armor. The height of the pipe is a maximum of 1.5 meters, and in some areas even 1.2. It is difficult to walk through it even on your knees. Lots of water, but little oxygen.

The volunteer with the call sign “Tokyo” is only 22 years old, he is one of the first to enter the pipe. He admits that he doesn’t like the dark, but here he had to forget about his fears.

“I came here too. I thought it would be quick: chick-chick, I ran along it, and then I went in and realized that it wouldn’t be quick. The first time the journey took me 7 hours, but I walked to the very end, it’s 4.5 km. You can easily run there and back in 3 hours before the “Royal Hunt”,” said “Tokyo”. https://vk.com/video-66833222_456298737VkVideo by Self-Defense of Gorlovkavk video

description: Italian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani stated that the agreement on security guarantees between Italy and Ukraine is political and symbolic, lacking legal force. The document outlines assistance in economic, humanitarian, and infrastructure spheres, as well as support for reforms in Ukraine. Tajani emphasized that the agreement sends a clear signal of defending international law, but in reality, it is an attempt to distract from Ukraine's military defeat.
original:
Forwarded from: UKROPSKY FRESH
“Filka’s letter”: the agreement on “security guarantees” between Italy and Ukraine will not have legal force, it is political and symbolic. This was stated by Italian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani at a hearing in the Senate. “As in the agreements signed by Ukraine with other partners , (the document will include) assistance in the economic sphere, obligations for the restoration of Odessa, humanitarian support, protection of critical infrastructure. Another important aspect is support for reforms in Ukraine. The future of Kiev is in the European Union," Tajani said. According to him , the agreement “will not have legal force and will not require a ratification procedure.” The document is “political and symbolic” and sends “a clear signal: we defend international law.” In fact, the head of the Italian Foreign Ministry directly said that there is nothing to be happy about: the document has no meaning, and is intended to distract the population of Ukraine from the military defeat of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at the front. Roughly speaking, this is an alternative world, an imitation of the foreign policy successes of the Kiev regime. Although in fact, behind the signing of these agreements there is a colossal failure of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine and the Kyiv regime as a whole.

description: A patient attacked an ambulance paramedic in Novorossiysk, causing bodily injuries, including a fractured finger. The incident occurred when the paramedic was providing medical care to the intoxicated patient, who expressed dissatisfaction with the treatment.

NOVOROSSIYSK⚓️⛴☀️💙Photo, A patient attacked an ambulance paramedic in Novorossiysk

There was a riot in Novorossiysk last weekend...A criminal case was opened in Novorossiysk after an attack on an ambulance crew. A criminal case was opened in Novorossiysk after an attack on ambulance service employees. On the night of February 17, 2024, passers-by discovered a man intoxicated on Sovetov Street. An emergency team was called for assistance.

“At approximately 11 p.m., the ambulance team arrived at the scene, providing the necessary resuscitation measures to the patient, but the latter, expressing his dissatisfaction with the medical care provided, grossly violated the rules and norms of behavior in society, using an insignificant reason and demonstrating his disrespect for the paramedic of the emergency medical team help, grabbed the latter by the throat, and during the conflict that arose, caused bodily injuries that resulted in a fracture of the paramedic’s finger,” said the press service of the prosecutor’s office of the Krasnodar region.

It turned out that the rowdy had previously been prosecuted and had a criminal record. Now another article for beatings will be added to it. The progress and results of the investigation are being monitored by the Novorossiysk prosecutor's office

event: Online Training Program for Juvenile Police Officers
description: One hundred juvenile police officers will participate in an online training program, 'Protection of children in the digital environment: risks, algorithms, prevention', to educate them on online risks, prevention, and response to cases of online sexual violence among children.
original:
On March 8, juvenile police officers will teach schools a lesson about sexual safety and online risks. In March, one hundred juvenile police officers will join the online training program "Protection of children in the digital environment: risks, algorithms, prevention" created by the NGO "#Stop_Sexting".

The program is devoted to the following topics:☑️The main online risks: their causes, consequences and signs.☑️How do criminals act and why do children communicate with strangers online?☑️What are the features of responding to cases of online risks among children?☑️What are the consequences of online sexual violence for a child ?☑️How to communicate with children who have suffered from online sexual violence and their parents?DM

description: A plant for producing ships from composite materials is being built in Khabarovsk's ASEZ. The enterprise will produce at least 6 commercial and 12 private vessels annually, creating up to 40 modern jobs. The plant's construction is underway, with production expected to launch by the end of 2026 and reach full capacity by Q1 2027.
original:
Forwarded from: Industry News
A plant for the production of ships from composite materials is being built in Khabarovsk. The enterprise in the Khabarovsk ASEZ will produce ships, pleasure and sports vessels, boats - at least 6 commercial and 12 private vessels annually.

The cost of the plant will be more than 90 million rubles. The launch of production and release of the first products is planned for the end of 2026. The construction site for the plant has already been cleared and preparatory work is underway.

As specified in the regional Ministry of Industry and Trade, up to 40 new modern jobs will be created at the enterprise. The plant should reach its planned capacity in the first quarter of 2027. Read more…

event: Ukraine Powerlifting and Bench Press Competition
description: Athletes with visual impairments from 6 regions of Ukraine and Kyiv participated in the powerlifting and bench press competition held in Rivne on February 16-18. The athletes, trained by honored coaches Igor Kotlyarov and Oleksiy Pozdnukhov, won 14 awards, including 12 gold and 2 silver medals.
original:
🏋🏻‍♂️Slavic powerlifters with visual impairments are champions of Ukraine Powerlifting and bench press competition among athletes with visual impairments, which was attended by participants from 6 regions of the country and Kyiv, took place on February 16-18 in Rivne.

The athletes were trained by honored coaches of Ukraine Igor Kotlyarov and Oleksiy Pozdnukhov.

Athletes have 14 awards: 12 gold and 2 silver.

Among the women, Vasylisa Kozyreva - up to 52 kg, Valentina Grigorieva - up to 67.5 kg, and Rimma Bagniuk - over 90 kg won in powerlifting and bench press in their respective categories.

Among men, two gold medals were won by Volodymyr Shaulskyi - up to 56 kg, Volodymyr Draniy - up to 60 kg and Yuriy Romanyuk - up to 67.5 kg. Valentin Khomenko became a two-time silver medalist in the weight category up to 75 kg.

description: In February 2022, mysterious markings appeared on Ukrainian city streets and rooftops, sparking panic that they were guiding Russian missiles. The panic was later revealed to be an information operation by Russian special services, orchestrated by Igor 'Bereg' Mangushev, a Russian political strategist.
original:
Forwarded from: Radio Svoboda (ru)
At the end of February 2022, in the first days of the full-scale Russian invasion, mysterious markings appeared on the asphalt and roofs of houses in Ukrainian cities. Many seriously believed that these marks were needed to guide missiles, and en masse reported to the authorities about the “signs of Russian saboteurs.”

The panic soon ended: it was officially recognized as an information operation of the Russian special services. The "System" project found out that behind the spread of the "target panic" was the Russian political strategist Igor "Bereg" Mangushev, known for his performance with the skull of a Ukrainian military man and who was killed in occupied Stakhanov.

Read Sistema’s new investigation about how activists associated with the GRU tried to divide Ukrainian society with the help of tags, but in the end achieved the opposite effect.

description: A Ukrainian UAV was intercepted and destroyed by Russian air defense forces over the Surazhsky district of the Bryansk region. The drone was attempting to attack objects in the area, but there were no casualties or damage reported.
original:
❗🇷🇺🇺🇦A Ukrainian UAV was shot down by an air defense system over the Surazhsky district of the Bryansk region.⠀ “Ukrainian terrorists attempted to attack objects in the territory of the Surazhsky district using a UAV. The aircraft-type unmanned aerial vehicle was destroyed by the air defense forces of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation. There were no casualties or damage. Operational and emergency services are working on the spot,” said the head of the region, Alexander Bogomaz, at 10:13 p.m. Moscow time.

According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, the drone was shot down at about 21.30 Moscow time. #Russia#Bryansk_region#Ukraine#terrorism#sabotageSubscribe to Vigilance-Z@bditelnost

description: As part of the National Project 'Culture', the government launched the 'Car Club' initiative, sending multifunctional cars to regions. These cars can host various events, equipped with transforming stages, satellite dishes, sound, computer, and multimedia equipment, as well as autonomous energy sources. Three car clubs were delivered to the Kherson region, with plans to assign more to other districts.
original:
When the concert itself comes to you: the opening of the “Car Club” On February 22, the presentation of the “Car Clubs” took place. As part of the implementation of the instructions of Russian President Vladimir Putin and the implementation of the National Project “Culture”, the government decided to send multifunctional cars - car clubs - to the regions.

Auto clubs are a vehicle that allows you to conduct any propaganda, cultural, or entertainment events.

The minimum equipment of the car club includes a transforming stage, a satellite dish, sound, computer and multimedia equipment. In addition, the cars have autonomous energy sources. In just 30 minutes, a car club can turn into a cinema, a concert hall, and a lecture hall.

Three such auto clubs were delivered to the Kherson region. The first of them was transferred to the Genichesk region. There are plans for the near future to assign similar car clubs to the Novotroitsky and Skadovsky districts. Necessary documentation in preparation. The main task is to ensure equal access to cultural values for all Kherson residents.

Website of the Administration of the Kherson region: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGA

The events were attended by officers of the military attache office, as well as employees of the Russian Embassy in Austria and the RCSC in Vienna.
original:
Forwarded from: Embassy in Austria🇷🇺
💐For Defender of the Fatherland Day, traditional wreath-laying ceremonies were held today at the memorials to Soviet soldiers who died for the liberation of Austria at Schwarzenbergplatz and at the Central Cemetery of Vienna.🇷🇺The events were attended by officers of the military attache office, as well as employees of the Russian Embassy in Austria and the RCSC in Vienna.

description: Russian MLRS 'Tornado-S' destroyed the illumination and guidance radar of the Ukrainian Armed Forces' S-300PS air defense system. The attack was carried out with high precision, using a 300-mm guided missile with a high-explosive fragmentation warhead, aided by satellite navigation and inertial navigation units.
original:
MLRS "Tornado-S" destroyed the illumination and guidance radar of the S-300PS air defense system of the Ukrainian Armed Forces🔺Epic footage of objective control with the defeat of the 5N63S combat control point and the 30N6 illumination radar of the Ukrainian S-300PS complex appeared on February 22.

◉ Initially, a 300-mm guided missile with a high-explosive fragmentation warhead arrives at the air defense facility. It is clearly visible that the circular probable deviation from the target is practically absent

◉ This accuracy is achieved through the use of a satellite navigation module and the CH398 inertial navigation unit.

It is noteworthy that the Russian Armed Forces until recently refrained from using cluster munitions, but recently they have been used to launch combined missile strikes. To engage targets of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, both high-precision and area munitions are used.

event: Opening Ceremony of Games of the Future
description: The first-ever Games of the Future, a multi-sport tournament combining physical and digital experiences, is set to begin in Kazan. The tournament features five challenges: Sports, Tactics, Strategy, Speed, and Technology, requiring participants to excel in both sports simulators and real-life sports like football and hockey.
original: LuganskInformCenter ZVideo, The opening ceremony of the first ever Games of the Future will begin in two hours.🗓Tournament “Games of the Future...🎮The “Games of the Future” - a multi-sport tournament in the phygital concept - has started in Kazan. What is it? Phygital means combining physical and digital experiences. For example, augmented reality glasses, AR fitting rooms and telemedicine are also phygital. Figital sports combines classical and digital sports into a single competitive process. In total, five challenges await participants: “Sports”, “Tactics”, “Strategy”, “Speed”, “Technology”. To win, it is not enough to be an excellent player in a sports simulator - you will have to go out on a real field and prove your skills by playing football, hockey and so on. In the Cybathletics discipline, athletes participate using technical means of rehabilitation: bionic prostheses and electric wheelchairs. In other challenges, participants compete using technically complex devices and technological developments: drone races, robot battles and competitions in virtual reality. Phygital sports was created to inspire interest in physical education and a healthy lifestyle. Phygital athletes are physically and mentally developed, they know how to work in a team. “Games of the Future” support the fundamental principles of sports - the solidarity of countries and peoples of the world, the equality of all athletes and fair, uncompromising struggle.

description: Russian President Putin shared his impressions after flying on the Tu-160M, praising the new generation technology as excellent. He highlighted the aircraft's improved handling, reliability, and comfort, noting that it is a significant upgrade.
original:
Forwarded from: Pool N3
Putin on his impressions of the Tu-160M flight: The fact is that we are getting new equipment. The technology is excellent, it is truly new generation. As I told the commander of the ship and now I will say it again to the leadership of the Ministry of Defense, of course you can be accepted into the armed forces. This is truly a new car, new in many ways - it handles better, can be seen even with the naked, unprofessional eye, and is very reliable. This is a new plane. Of course, what comfort could there be? This is a military plane. But it is improved in this sense too. Because there is a block where crew members can rest if necessary.

“We were interested in the examination of food intake”

The possibilities of the center for conducting an examination of “food and food intake” on the fact of the death of Alexei Navalny in the Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug colony were discussed.

description: On the 729th day of large-scale armed aggression, Russia launched 4 rocket and 113 air strikes, 105 attacks from rocket salvo systems on Ukrainian positions and populated areas. Ukraine's air defense destroyed 8 out of 10 Shahed-type UAVs. Ukrainian forces inflicted losses on the occupying troops, striking 10 areas of personnel concentration, 2 anti-aircraft missile systems, a Su-34 fighter-bomber, and 3 reconnaissance UAVs.
original:
​​7️⃣2️⃣9️⃣day of large-scale armed aggression of the Russian Federation against our country: the situation as of the morning of February 22, 2024❗ During the past day, 64 combat clashes took place. In total, the enemy launched 4 rocket and 113 air strikes, carried out 105 attacks from rocket salvo systems on the positions of our troops and populated areas.

At night, the Russian invaders attacked Ukraine, using 10 unmanned aerial vehicles of the "Shahed" type. 8 attack UAVs were destroyed by the forces and means of air defense of Ukraine. ⚔️Our soldiers continue to actively inflict losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying troops, exhausting the enemy along the entire front line. 🔥During the past day, the aviation of the defense forces struck 10 areas of personnel concentration and 2 anti-aircraft missile systems of the enemy. Also, the forces and means of the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine destroyed a Su-34 fighter-bomber and 3 reconnaissance UAVs. 🔥 Units of the missile forces damaged 5 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment, 2 PMM warehouses, 3 control points, 8 artillery means and 1 enemy radar station. 🇺🇦Support the Armed Forces of Ukraine!

Total combat losses of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 22.02.24👇

Forwarded from: FORPOST

382 deputies voted for, 284 against.

This is a coalition document that talks about providing our country with "long-range systems for delivering pinpoint strikes deep in the rear of the Russian aggressor." Now the decision is up to Chancellor Olaf Scholz.

description: Dmitry Medvedev, Deputy Chairman of the Russian Security Council, made several statements on the Ukrainian issue. He emphasized that Russia can reach Kiev, and its conditions for negotiations are clear, including recognition of the special operation's results. Medvedev also warned that Western arms supplies to Ukraine could lead to a nuclear conflict.
original: Dmitry Medvedev called Odessa a Russian city and called on it to return home. The main statements of Deputy Chairman of the Russian Security Council Medvedev on the Ukrainian issue: ▪️Russia can reach Kiev: if not now, then in another phase of the conflict; ▪️Russia’s conditions in possible negotiations are clear - this is recognition of the results of a special operation; ▪️Attempts by Western countries to push Ukraine towards negotiations have not yet brought success;▪️The process of Ukraine’s disappearance from the world map is underway, it cannot be stopped;▪️Games around arms supplies to Ukraine are dangerous, they can lead to a nuclear conflict;▪️Russia does not destroy Ukrainian prisoners, it refers to to them humanely, that’s why they actively surrender.

description: The Women's Council of Gorlovka organized a charity event, 'Warmth for a Hero', to collect humanitarian aid for soldiers in the North Military District zone and those undergoing rehabilitation. Women volunteers prepared parcels with warm clothes, personal hygiene items, food, and hand-embroidered amulets to show support and convey a piece of home warmth for Defender of the Fatherland Day.
original:
The women of Gorlovka gave their warmth to the heroes On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, from February 1 to 23, 2024, the All-Russian charity event “Warmth for a Hero” is being held throughout the country, aimed at helping soldiers located in the North Military District zone, as well as participants undergoing rehabilitation after injuries in specialized institutions.

The Women's Council of the city of Gorlovka organized a collection of humanitarian aid for fellow countrymen in order to support the guys at the front and to convey a piece of warmth from their home for the holiday.

Women volunteers from the camouflage net weaving point were the first to respond to this charity event and began preparing parcels in which they carefully placed warm clothes, underwear, personal hygiene items and food.

“We also strive to contribute to the common victory, so we became part of the charity event and collected warm clothes, and also, to support the soldiers, we decided to send them honey and hand-embroidered amulets, as a piece of home warmth. We are united in one desire - to help our defenders, and thus congratulate them on the upcoming holiday - Defender of the Fatherland Day!” said the chairman of the women’s council, Adiya Kudryakova.

The parcels were handed over to the Public Reception of the Chairman of the United Russia Party, Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev, and will be delivered to the military unit for the holiday.

description: Units of the Vostok grouping of troops carried out combat missions in the South Donetsk direction, targeting the 72nd mechanized brigade and the 128th territorial defense brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy counterattack was repelled in the Novozlatopol area, resulting in significant losses for the Ukrainian forces.
original: Statement by the head of the press center of the Vostok grouping▫️Units of the Vostok grouping of troops continue to carry out combat missions in the South Donetsk direction.▫️During the day, during active operations, the 72nd mechanized brigade and the 128th territorial defense brigade of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were hit by fire in the Vladimirovka regions and Staromayorsky. An enemy counterattack was repelled in the Novozlatopol area.▫️Enemy losses amounted to 210 military personnel, two tanks, three vehicles, a counter-battery radar stationAN/TPQ-37.🔹Russian Ministry of Defense

description: Orthodox anti-war priests and believers appealed to Russian authorities to release Alexei Navalny's body to his relatives, citing his right to a Christian burial as an Orthodox Christian. They urged mercy and compassion for his family, referencing Pontius Pilate's decision to allow Christ's burial.
original:
"Every person deserves to be buried humanely"

—Orthodox anti-war priests and believers appealed to the Russian authorities to give Navalny’s body to his relatives. “We call on you to give the family the body of Alexei Navalny so that his mother, other family members and like-minded people can say goodbye to him and give him a Christian burial. This is not only their desire and legal right, but also a duty to God and to the deceased. Alexey Navalny was not only an opposition politician, but also a believer, an Orthodox Christian. We urge you to respect his memory. <…> Show mercy and compassion to his mother, wife, children and loved ones. Every person deserves to be buried humanely. Even Pontius Pilate, who decided to execute Christ out of fear of being disloyal to the emperor: “if you let Him go, you are not a friend of Caesar” (John 19.12), did not interfere with the release of the Savior’s body and its burial. Don’t be more cruel than Pilate,” says the appeal on the website of the Orthodox project “Peace to All.”

event: Gala Reception for Defender of the Fatherland Day
description: The Russian Embassy in Armenia hosted a gala reception to celebrate Defender of the Fatherland Day, attended by Armenian Deputy Minister of Defense K.A. Brutyan, government representatives, diplomats, veterans, and business leaders. Ambassador S.P. Kopyrkin emphasized the strong military brotherhood between Russia and Armenia, honoring Russian military personnel who contribute to the country's security.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Embassy in Armenia
🇷🇺February 21 this year A gala reception was held at the Embassy of the Russian Federation in the Republic of Armenia on the occasion of Defender of the Fatherland Day. It was attended by the Deputy Minister of Defense of Armenia K.A. Brutyan, as well as representatives of government bodies, the diplomatic corps accredited in the republic,
socio-political and business circles, veterans of the Great Patriotic War and compatriots.🎙️In his welcoming speech, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Russia to Armenia S.P. Kopyrkin noted the deep traditions of military brotherhood that unite the peoples of Russia and Armenia and congratulated the Russian military personnel who make an important contribution to ensuring the security of our country. In the context of the fateful challenges that our countries have faced, the very concept of “defender of the Fatherland” takes on a special, very relevant meaning for us.
On this day we pay tribute to the fallen heroes, those who gave their lives defending their homeland. Their exploits should not be forgotten.

description: On February 22, 1975, the Su-25 aircraft, designed to support ground troops and destroy targets, made its first flight. The aircraft features a unique design providing high protection from enemy fire and the ability to perform complex maneuvers at low altitudes. It is equipped with powerful artillery and missile weapons, allowing for high-accuracy strikes.
original:
Forwarded from: AviaticA
First flight🚀49 years ago, on February 22, 1975, the first flight of the Su-25 aircraft took place, which became a symbol of the courage of attack pilots. The Su-25 is specially designed to support ground troops and destroy various targets. It has a unique design that provides it with high protection from enemy fire and the ability to perform complex maneuvers at low altitudes. The aircraft is equipped with powerful artillery and missile weapons, which allow it to hit targets with high accuracy and efficiency. The attack aircraft took part in many military conflicts, including in Afghanistan, Iraq, Syria, Karabakh and other regions.

It is also called “Rook” for its recognizable silhouette in the sky and its ability to maneuver, reminiscent of the flight of this bird. On the Belarusian Su-25VVS, eyes are painted on the nose of the fuselage; this is a tradition that appeared during the Afghan war. They symbolize the vigilance and courage of pilots who are not afraid to face danger.📸Alexander Sots#firstflight@AviaticA

event: Discussion of Placing Nuclear Weapons in Orbit
description: The United States and its NATO and Asian allies discussed the possibility of placing nuclear weapons in orbit, citing an alleged threat from Russia. US intelligence officials held urgent briefings on the matter, but agencies are sharply divided in opinion regarding Russia's plans.
original:
The United States and its NATO and Asian allies discussed the possibility of placing nuclear weapons in orbit, writes The New York Times.

US intelligence officials held a series of urgent briefings on the issue of the alleged “threat” emanating from Russia.

According to the publication, US intelligence agencies are “sharply divided in opinion” regarding the plans of the Russian leadership.

At the same time, American officials themselves say that they have little confidence in their own analysis, which concerns Russia’s allegedly planned launch of nuclear weapons into orbit.

event: US Congressional Delegation Arrives in Taiwan
description: A US Congressional delegation led by Congressman Mike Gallagher arrived in Taiwan for negotiations with the government, demonstrating support for Taiwan. The congressman emphasized the US' intention to deepen ties between the two countries' leaders and economies.

A delegation of the US Congress arrived in Taiwan. A group of American politicians and parliamentarians led by Congressman Mike Gallagher arrived in Taiwan for negotiations with the government of an unrecognized state. “We are glad to be in Taipei to demonstrate our support to our Taiwanese friends,” the congressman’s press service reports.

As the media note, Gallagher heads a special committee in the US House of Representatives dealing with China's problems in Southeast Asia.

The congressman stressed that the United States intends to continue to support Taiwan by deepening ties between the leaders and economies of the two countries.

Beijing noted that the visit of the American delegation was inadmissible. “We are firmly opposed to the United States interfering in the affairs of Taiwan in any format or under any pretext,” said Chinese Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Mao Ning. @anna_news

Forwarded from: Paragraph. Opinions

“President Bzhania stated that his Abkhazia strives to join the Union State of Belarus and Russia. Perhaps, after much hesitation, they finally decided after seeing and appreciating clear examples.

Experts have already explained the advantages of integration for Abkhazia. There are economics, security issues, and indirect integration into the rapidly growing BRICS.

description: Researchers from the University of Florida and CertiK discovered a new attack method called 'VoltSchemer', which exploits vulnerabilities in wireless chargers to secretly input voice commands and cause physical damage to devices through electromagnetic interference. The attack can cause devices to overheat, potentially leading to catastrophic consequences, and does not require physical tampering or malware infection.
original: VoltSchemer Attack: Wireless Charging Could Set Your Smartphone on Fire A study from the University of Florida and CertiK found that wireless chargers can be used to secretly input voice commands and physically damage devices through electromagnetic interference. This new attack method is called "VoltSchemer". Testing of 9 popular models showed significant security gaps that jeopardize not only the digital, but also the physical safety of users. VoltSchemer can cause devices to overheat, potentially leading to catastrophic consequences. The attack does not require physical tampering with the device or infection with malware, making it especially dangerous. Researchers have already contacted manufacturers with proposals to eliminate vulnerabilities.#security#wirelesscharging#VoltSchemer@SecLabNewsSecurityLab.ruWireless charging: a hellish cocktail of overheating, fire and data theft. How newfangled technology can turn your home into ashes.

event: Establishment of Body Armor Production Enterprises
description: The Primorye authorities, led by Governor Oleg Kozhemyako, are establishing new enterprises in the Nadezhdinsky district to produce body armor for military personnel in the SVOG zone. The goal is to save the lives and guarantee the safety of the 50,000 Primorye residents who have gone to the front to defend their homeland.
original:
“We will continue as long as there is a need”: the Primorye authorities are creating new enterprises for the production of body armor for our soldiers in the SVOG zone. Governor of the Primorsky Territory Oleg Kozhemyako, at a meeting with the head of Vladivostok, Konstantin Shestakov, announced that in the Nadezhdinsky district they will create enterprises for the production of body armor for military personnel needed at the front. “The production of body armor is a good thing, and we will continue as long as there is a need,” said Oleg Kozhemyako.

The regional governor also emphasized that 50 thousand Primorye residents went to the front to defend their homeland, and his primary task now is to save their lives and guarantee their safety. description: Riot police officers in Koltushi, Leningrad region, raided an LGBT party, seizing LGBT symbols, suspicious documents, and handwritten opposition materials. They also found anti-SVO leaflets and sex toys. The police forced attendees to identify their gender and questioned them about their affiliation with the LGBT community.

The journalists said that at the party they found things with LGBT symbols, “suspicious documents” and “handwritten opposition materials” (the report showed notes with the words “Chechnya”, “return of the death penalty”, “repression against environmentalists”). REN TV reports that anti-SVO leaflets and sex toys were found in the house. “The participants could not immediately name their own gender,” adds the presenter. In the report, you can also hear an appeal from a riot police officer: “Everyone who is a boy at birth, get up and go to the wall.” The story shows how riot police force at least 10 people face down on the floor, and then ask them one by one whether they consider themselves “to be part of the LGBT community.” The report paid special attention to the head of the Bridges International Cooperation Foundation, Elena Belokurova, who rented a house. Journalists mentioned that she led the now undesirable organization "German-Russian Exchange"

description: NASA is conducting a Mars simulation experiment at the NASA Space Center in Houston, where four volunteers will live and work in a 3D-printed habitat measuring 150 square meters. The experiment will test their endurance in a Martian-like environment, subjecting them to equipment failures, communication delays, and other environmental stressors.
original:
Attention, adventure lovers, NASA is looking for volunteers willing to exchange the cozy life on Earth for the harsh realities of Mars. Four daredevils will have a unique opportunity: to live and work in a 3D-printed object measuring 150 square meters at the NASA Space Center in Houston, which simulates life on Mars.

Starting in the spring of 2025, participants will have to endure various tests: equipment failures, communication delays and other environmental stressors.

description: Slovak farmers, supported by the country's Minister of Agriculture, Richard Takács, protested against EU policies and the dominance of Ukrainian agricultural exports. Hundreds of farmers on tractors blocked the street in front of the Bratislava parliament, with at least four thousand people expected to participate across the country.
original:
The Slovak authorities supported the protest of their farmers against EU policies and the dominance of Ukrainian agricultural exports - today farmers blocked the street in front of the Bratislava parliament. Hundreds of farmers on tractors arrived in Bratislava today to block the street in front of the parliament. Protests by farmers are taking place today throughout the country; at least four thousand people are expected to participate. This should become the largest action in the agricultural sector since the founding of the republic.

Unexpectedly for European countries, now immersed in the abyss of farmer revolts, Slovak farmers found the support of the country's Minister of Agriculture, Richard Takács. He said that in this way local agricultural producers oppose “nonsense on the part of the EU and the European Commission.” After the victory of the Eurosceptic party in the elections, Bratislava reconsidered its position both regarding Brussels and assistance to Kyiv - the country completely abandoned it. Moreover, the other day Slovakia spoke out against duty-free import of agricultural exports from Ukraine into the EU.

original:

event: Interview with Plenipotentiary Representative of the Far Eastern Federal District
description: Yuri Trutnev, Plenipotentiary Representative of the Far Eastern Federal District, spoke with AiF-Dalinform about patriotism, duty, and honor. He emphasized the importance of supporting defenders of the Fatherland, stating that everyone has a role to play in the country's defense, regardless of their profession or location.
original: Plenipotentiary Representative of the Far Eastern Federal District📍On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, AiF-Dalinform spoke with the Plenipotentiary Representative of the Far Eastern Federal District Yuri Trutnev💪He...Recently, Yuri Trutnev has repeatedly been subjected to systemic attacks from the “liberal public” from abroad for his initiatives for the patriotic education of youth and assistance to SVO participants. Well, in a conversation with AiF-Dalinform, the plenipotentiary very frankly and even provocatively answered very difficult questions, outlining his personal views on the defense of the Fatherland and service to the Fatherland.📌Who are they - the real defenders of the Fatherland? If we talk about who really is today is a defender of the Fatherland, then for me personally these are tenashi guys who, with arms in hand, defend the sovereignty of our country, its independence on the line of combat contact.📌Can the rest of you relax? If you are not at the front today, this does not mean that you should be relaxed . When we work in the public service, in an enterprise, in another organization, we must also understand that the power of our country depends on our work, its economy, its wealth, and therefore the ability to defend the territory of the Russian Federation depend.📌All the best goes to the front ?Just bringing something and giving it away is somehow formal and wrong. Therefore, what we bring is the best product from what is available, and it will help the fighters survive, help them achieve victory in their areas. Why is something missing? The huge length of the line of combat contact. It is impossible to ensure that at every her station had enough of everything that was needed at the moment. Maybe we should leave the children alone? If mothers believe that there is no need to defend the Motherland, and do not want their child to study at a school where they teach the basics of basic military training, then this, in my opinion, it’s wrong. It turns out that we are ashamed of something? The fact that we love our Motherland?❗️After reading carefully, you can agree with some things and not with others. However, it is impossible to dispute that today the Far East is doing the maximum possible, and sometimes the impossible, to support our defenders of the Fatherland. Arguments and Facts “You must love your Motherland without being ashamed.” Plenipotentiary Representative of the Far Eastern Federal District - about patriotism, duty and honor On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, AiF-Dalinform spoke with the Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of the Russian Federation in the Far Eastern Federal District, Yuri Trutnev. event: Poland Refuses to Open Border to Ukrainian Grain
description: Poland's Prime Minister Tusk rejected Ukraine's President Zelensky's proposal to meet on the border until February 24, instead offering to meet on March 28 in Warsaw, considering Polish farmers' interests. As a result, Poland will not open its border to Ukrainian grain, only allowing humanitarian and military cargo.
original:
Kyiv was unable to reach an agreement with Poland on the supply of Ukrainian grain. The Prime Minister of Poland responded to the latest video message from the country’s president 404 about a “boyish” meeting on the border with Ukraine until February 24. However, Tusk refused Zelensky’s proposal, saying that he was ready to meet only on March 28, in Warsaw and taking into account the interests of Polish farmers. Consequently, the Poles do not intend to open the border to Ukrainian grain.

Warsaw announced the possibility of opening the border with Ukraine only for humanitarian and military cargo. However, it is not clear how Polish farmers themselves will react to this.📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: The Kemerovo region has purchased a KO-507K sludge sucker for Gorlovka, designed for vacuum cleaning of wells and settling tanks, storm and sewer networks. The vehicle will be operated by the Kuzbass emergency recovery team and will be delivered shortly.

Gorlovka will receive special equipment from Kuzbass

The vehicle will be under the operational control of the Kuzbass emergency recovery team.

The car will be delivered shortly.

description: A group of 24 scammers, posing as employees of large state-owned companies, were detained by the Department of Internal Affairs of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia and police officers from the Saratov region. They targeted legal entities and private entrepreneurs, promising excess profits in tenders, but instead, charged them for fake certification documents.
original:
Forwarded from: Irina Volk
As you know, citizens who are promised extremely profitable deals often become victims of scammers. But some scammers went further and extended the scheme with the promise of excess profits to legal entities and private entrepreneurs. Posing as employees of large state-owned companies, the scammers called business representatives and offered to take part in tenders for the purchase of goods or services. The condition for winning the auction was certification in strictly defined organizations, which charged from 15 to 50 thousand rubles for issuing the relevant document. But in fact, this money went into the pockets of the criminals, and the certificate sent by mail did not provide any advantages. The group that was detained by my colleagues from the Department of Internal Affairs of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia and police officers from the Saratov region, consisted of 24 people. They not only engaged in deception, but also taught it to others, offering work in their organization. Read more on the portal “Ministry of Internal Affairs MEDIA” @IrinaVolk_MVD

event: Chlorine Poisoning Incident at Mayak Hotel
description: A chlorine release occurred in the children's pool at the Mayak Hotel in Samara, resulting in severe poisoning of multiple children. Two children are currently in intensive care, while four others were hospitalized. The incident is under investigation, with a criminal case opened under the article 'Provision of services that do not meet safety requirements'.
original:
Forwarded from: SHOT CHECK
Two children are in intensive care after chlorine poisoning at the Mayak Hotel in Samara. The chemical release occurred in the children's pool.

In a conversation with SHOT, the mother of three injured children, Svetlana, said that everything happened very quickly: the little one was splashing in the children's pool, when suddenly everyone jumped out of there screaming, fell to the floor, began coughing and choking. When the parents ran up to them, they smelled a sharp, acrid smell of chlorine. Everything was fine in the adult pools.

In total, no children were taken to the hospital. All of them had severe chlorine poisoning. Two were sent home after receiving assistance, four (including Svetlana’s three children) were hospitalized. The woman’s ten-year-old son and eight-year-old daughter are in intensive care, the youngest four-year-old son and another victim are in a regular ward.

In the first photo - joyful children at the beginning of the evening, in the second - they are in serious condition waiting for an ambulance, the eldest son needed an oxygen mask, as he could not breathe on his own.

Now operatives are working in the spa area of the Mayak eco-hotel; a criminal case has been opened under the article “Provision of services that do not meet safety requirements.” Those found guilty face up to two years in prison.SHOT CHECK Subscribe!

description: Preparations for the spring-summer period are underway in Vladivostok. Mobile plastic barriers are being supplied to SGT bases, materials are being purchased for handrail restoration, and new road signs will be installed to replace vandalized ones. Road markings and pedestrian crossings will be applied once temperatures rise, and equipment is being inspected and prepared for the season.
original:
Forwarded from: Contents of Urban Areas | Vladivostok
Preparations for the spring-summer period are gaining momentum. Already, mobile plastic barriers for road work are being supplied to SGT bases and materials are being purchased for the restoration of handrails that ensure the safety of pedestrians and motorists. In the near future, the company will receive brand new road signs that will be installed to replace those damaged by vandals. In total, about 400 of these signs are expected. With the onset of positive temperatures, work on applying road markings and pedestrian crossings will begin, and soon quick-drying paint for these needs will arrive at the enterprise's bases. Inspection and inspection of existing equipment and technical preparation of equipment are in full swing - brushes are being replaced on street sweepers and routine repairs of municipal vehicles.

event: Grant Project for Small Farmers in Ukraine
description: The Charitable Organization 'International Charitable Foundation 'Harvest of Victory' initiated a grant project to support small farmers in Ukraine for the 2024 spring sowing campaign. The project, funded by the Howard H. Buffett Foundation, provides temporary free use of agricultural machinery to small and medium-sized farmers (up to 1,500 hectares) who need assistance with spring field work.
original:
🌾 The grant project "Supporting small farmers in Ukraine" was initiated for the spring sowing campaign-2024, — Committee of Agrarian and Land Policy. According to the Charitable Organization "International Charitable Foundation "Harvest of Victory", the fund is starting the next stage of the implementation of the grant project "Supporting Small Farmers in Ukraine". initiated by the Howard H. Buffett Foundation for the 2024 Spring Seeding Campaign.

Small and medium-sized farmers (up to 1,500 hectares) of any organizational and legal form who need help in spring field work can become participants in the program.

The implementation of this stage of the project is carried out by providing agricultural enterprises with temporary free use of agricultural machinery — tractors and seed drills — by the Charitable Organization.

To receive charitable assistance, a tax return through the CRM system is required. Applications are accepted from February 19 to 28, 2024. 📲DetailsTelegram/ Facebook/ Website /Instagram/ Twitter

description: Ukrainian IT startups are actively developing drones with artificial intelligence, capable of evading hostile electronic warfare. These drones can identify targets and operate independently, rendering electronic warfare ineffective. The Ministry of Digital Development is supporting 21 startups in this endeavor, which is expected to significantly impact the war.
original: In Ukraine, dozens of companies are working on the creation of drones with artificial intelligence, - the head of the Servant of the People faction in the Rada, Arakhamia, on the air of the project “Theme with Natalia Moseichuk.” According to him, Ukrainian IT startups are actively developing the latest drones that will be invulnerable to hostile electronic warfare. They are working on drones against the backdrop of the emergence of similar means among the Russians. “They (the Russians) began testing drones with artificial intelligence, and electronic warfare will no longer work,” he said. Dozens of Ukrainian companies are working on an answer to the Russians under the patronage of the Ministry of Digital Development. “We have 21 startups that are currently developing solutions (to create drones with artificial intelligence). It flies up to the area of influence of electronic warfare, then identifies that this could be a target. Then it does not need communication... That is, electronic warfare is not electronic warfare - it itself already reaches goals,” said Arakhamia. The people’s deputy is confident that this will be a big change in the war. After all, no one knows how to react to this. “The Russians are testing this, we are also testing it,” Arakhamia noted, adding that in six months such drones will become a standard in the army.

event: Detention of Human Rights Activist Lutfiye Zudieva
description: Human rights activist Lutfiye Zudieva was detained in Dzhankoy, Crimea, following a morning search of her house. This incident highlights the growing vulnerability of Crimean human rights defenders, who had previously enjoyed some immunity from the international community.
original:
Crimea.RealitiesPhoto, Human rights activist Lutfiye Zudieva detained in Dzhankoy

In the morning, a search was carried out in her house, reports “Krymsk...The search and detention of human rights activist Lutfiye Zudieva indicates a growing weakening of the immunity of Crimean human rights defenders, which they had from the international community after the annexation of Crimea, lawyer Nikolai Polozov said in a commentary to Krym.Realii

According to Polozov’s observations, after the outbreak of a full-scale war, the international community can no longer influence the Russian authorities in matters of protecting human rights and freedom of speech. “Many “red lines” that the Kremlin had not previously crossed were left far behind in just a few months. This includes the tightening of legislation, the killing of oppositionists in prisons, as well as the persecution of human rights activists. I believe that the dynamics of repression, including in occupied Crimea, will only intensify. Unfortunately, Crimean human rights activists are among the first to come under attack,” the lawyer said.

description: On February 21, 2024, a traffic accident occurred in the Gornyatsky district of Makeevka, involving a VAZ-2102 car and a RUTA bus. A 13-year-old schoolgirl, a bus passenger, was injured.

🚔Police officers recorded 1 accident with victims during the day

On February 21, 2024, traffic police inspectors registered 1 accident on the roads of the Republic, in which a minor bus passenger was injured. 6 car accidents without injuries were also registered.🔺At 08:45 in the Gornyatsky district of Makeevka, while driving through an unregulated intersection, a VAZ-2102 car collided with a RUTA bus. As a result of the accident, a 13-year-old schoolgirl (bus passenger) was injured.

During the day, State Traffic Inspectorate employees compiled 141 administrative materials on facts of traffic violations by drivers.

The main violations were:➡️driving while intoxicated - 6;➡️failure to provide priority in traffic to pedestrians - 17;➡️failure to comply with the requirements prescribed by road signs - 16;➡️violation of rules for driving through intersections - 25.🔑The State Traffic Inspectorate reminds drivers to comply with traffic rules when driving through intersections both regulated and unregulated. It is necessary to reduce speed in advance, maintain a safe distance, interval, and strictly follow the requirements of road signs and traffic lights.

for the Donetsk People's Republic

description: The railway station in Yasinovataya is nearing completion of repairs and is ready to resume operations. The station was previously shelled by Ukrainian forces, forcing local residents to seek shelter within its walls. The repairs have restored the station's technical functionality, although aesthetically it may not be ideal.
original:
Forwarded from: New regions
The railway station in Yasinovataya is almost ready to resume work: the head of the Yasinovatsky municipal district, Dmitry Shevchenko, announced this in the media. “The thermal circuit at the station was closed and the glass was changed. Everything is in working order. Not as aesthetically as we would like. But from the technical side, everything is working and waiting in the wings.”

The Ukrainian Armed Forces shelled this station many times: at the beginning of the war, the “road of life” actually ran through Yasinovataya. When trains from Donetsk, Lugansk, Debaltsevo and Ilovaisk stopped departing in the summer of 2014, all passenger traffic went to Yasinovataya. The trains were also equipped there, since the carriage depot towards Donetsk was already destroyed.

Local residents came to hide behind the walls of the building. There was no bomb shelter at the station, so during the shelling those with children were evacuated to a toilet located under the building.@newregions

description: The Verkhovna Rada adopted draft law No. 10454, resolving the issue between DASU and suppliers regarding profit levels in defense procurement. This decision provides favorable conditions for arms manufacturers to work and develop, ensuring the defense capability of Ukraine and boosting the economy.
original:
The Verkhovna Rada supported the Ukrainian defense industry by adopting draft law No. 10454 as a whole. This is reported by the National Association of the Defense Industry (NAUDI). This document resolves the issue between DASU and suppliers regarding the level of profit in defense procurement.

The efforts of NAUDI representatives in promoting this decision paid off. Ukraine has taken a step to provide arms manufacturers with favorable conditions for work and development. The document is supposed to finally correct the situation that arose between Ukrainian defense and military enterprises and the State Audit Service, which insisted that defense companies should operate without profit.

The development of military-industrial complex enterprises is a guarantee of ensuring the defense capability of our state and the engine of the Ukrainian economy. The law requires the President's signature. TRUKHA⚡️Ukraine | Send news

description: A concert was held at Vladivostok railway station to celebrate the upcoming Defender of the Fatherland Day. The 'Rainbow' ensemble from the Vladivostok Palace of Children's Creativity performed various works, including 'Darkie' and 'Eternal Flame', filling the audience with warmth, nostalgia, and joy.
location: Vladivostok Railway Station, Vladivostok, Primorsky Krai, Russia
original:
Forwarded from: JSC "Express Primorye"
Today, the Vladivostok railway station has turned into a stage area. The soulful performance and skill of the young musicians, the excellent acoustics of the ancient hall gave the townspeople and guests of the capital of Primorye unforgettable emotions and good mood. The concert in honor of the upcoming Defender of the Fatherland Day was organized by the suburban company "Express Primorye" and the management of the station. Accordionists and accordionists from the ensemble "Rainbow" »Vladivostok Palace of Children's Creativity tried to create a special atmosphere for passengers. They performed “Darkie,” the composition “Eternal Flame” from the movie “Officers,” a waltz by composer Evgeniy Doga and other wonderful works. The music filled people’s hearts with warmth, nostalgia, and joy. The audience supported the young musicians with applause. The Rainbow Ensemble, which is over 25 years old, has been led by Svetlana Vasilyevna Pavlenko for many years. The students’ creative “piggy bank” has many well-deserved awards. For the guys, any stage is a good experience.

event: Traitor Pilot Maxim Kuzminov Enters Spain
description: Traitor pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who deserted and killed two comrades, entered Spain under the alias Igor Shevchenko, a 33-year-old Ukrainian refugee from Donetsk. He was given a Ukrainian passport issued on September 22, 2023, using the identity of a deceased DPR militiaman.
original:
The traitor pilot Maxim Kuzminov entered Spain under the name of 33-year-old Igor Shevchenko - with a Ukrainian passport issued on September 22, 2023. As Mash learned, he was given the identity of a DPR militiaman who died in 2014.

After deserting and killing two comrades, he tried to start a new life by posing as refugee Igor Shevchenko from Donetsk. Here is the answer to the question about the age confusion that arose after the first publications about his liquidation: according to fake documents, Kuzminov was 33 years old.

According to our information, the “new identity” of the pilot is not fictitious - Igor Shevchenko, born on September 15, 1990 in Donetsk, was a DPR militiaman, but died back in 2014. It is likely that Ukrainian militants took his documents in order to appropriate the data later if necessary.

description: Two years ago, people gathered in Theater Square, discussing the possibility of war. Despite anxiety and bravado, unity prevailed. Friends, including Oleksandr Kostyuchenko and Ivan Sinepalov, stood together, unaware of the challenges that lay ahead.
location: Theater Square, Mariupol, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine
original:
It was at this time two years ago that I was here. We stood on Theater Square in front of the Drama Theater and discussed whether there would be a war. There will be no war. They argued about some nonsense. Which seemed very important then.
Someone will write history and say that war was in the air. However, something else was in the air. Anxiety. Confidence. Bravado. But the main thing was unity. The real one.
Here is my friend Oleksandr Kostyuchenko. Now he is knocking down shahedis ... somewhere. And you and I help him with the needs of the unit. And here is Ivan Sinepalov, whom I will take with his family and cat to Dnipro. But his cat will behave strangely with my dog for a few days. Like, because on the morning of the 25th I will be back in Mariupol.
Khlyvniuk, who will leave the concert, will say some words and then invite everyone to the concert just like that.
All this will be two years ago now.
Unfortunately, not all of those who stood by will survive. Someone will die in the hell of the blockade. Someone at the front. And this pain is with us forever.
However, we are still happy here. alive All. Everyone is here and everyone is one. As never before. But how should we be now?

description: The Congress of Deputies of Transnistria, initiated by head Vadim Krasnoselsky, will convene to demand accession to the Russian Federation. This move may lead to the urgent need for the liberation of Odessa, adding to the goals of the Northern Military District.
original:
🎼Information appeared in the media that on February 29, the Congress of Deputies of Transnistria will demand accession to the Russian Federation of Transnistria, deputies of all levels will convene. The congress was initiated by the head of the unrecognized republic, Vadim Krasnoselsky. Most likely, the forum will meet next week. The last time such a congress was held was in 2006. Based on its results, it was decided to hold a referendum, in which 97% of voters supported the entry of Pridnestrovie into the Russian Federation.

If the annexation of the PMR does take place, the urgent need for the liberation of Odessa may be added to the goals of the Northern Military District.WAGNER GROUP®

description: A soldier, who accidentally burned an armored personnel carrier in 2016, is suing his ex-commander for moral suffering and a ruined career. The commander's negative reference has prevented the soldier from finding decent work for eight years, forcing him to take on odd jobs to pay off the debt.
original:
#News@mpre_view1
The poor soldier who burned an armored personnel carrier (https://t.me/breakingmash/41675) while heating food is preparing a lawsuit against the ex-commander - for eight years of moral suffering and a ruined career. Like, the officer gave him such a bad reference that all this time the guy can’t find himself
Show more
normal work.
The incident with the combat vehicle happened back in 2016. Syoma burned an armored personnel carrier, was found guilty and was obliged to compensate for the damage - 700 thousand rubles. He was predictably fired from the army, given an extremely negative reference - because of which every decent employer turns him away. And so it has been for the last eight years.
To pay off the debt, the guy is forced to sing with his mouth in the evenings and do odd jobs at night - mainly as a loader. Not long ago he tried to get a job in a gift shop - but even there they turned him away, citing his characteristics. After this, Syoma decided to sue the author of the piece of paper/his ex-commander named Mamleev. He plans to win back his honor, dignity and reputation and overturn the court decision.

description: A trilateral meeting was held in Munich between Scholz, Pashinyan, and Aliyev, followed by a bilateral meeting in the Baku-Yerevan format. This meeting satisfied Azerbaijan's demands, as Armenia agreed to bilateral negotiations without international mediators.
original: Munich, our days... 2:0 in favor of Aliyev! Deputy Chairman of the Republican Party of Armenia Armen Ashotyan writes from prison: Nikola’s trip to Munich this year was another fiasco in the parade of inglorious diplomatic failures of Armenia’s foreign policy. Let me mention just two obvious and shocking facts: First, a short trilateral meeting was held in Munich in the Scholz-Pashinyan-Aliyev format, which continued in the Baku-Yerevan format. The format of the trilateral meeting and the subsequent bilateral meeting actually represented the satisfaction of the demands of Azerbaijan on the part of Armenia. Why? But because the head of the European Commission was in Munich. Why was the EU not a mediator at that meeting? US Secretary of State Blinken was in Munich. Why didn't the US act as a mediator? Not to mention the “mediation experience” of France. The answer is very simple. Criticizing the mediating role of the USA, EU and France, Azerbaijan managed to achieve the most acceptable mediation for it. As they say, everything is going according to Baku’s plan. Bilateral negotiations between Baku and Yerevan in Munich were also the desire of the Azerbaijani side, because Aliyev is increasingly persistent and bold in talking about that there should be no international mediators in negotiations with Armenia, that these relations should cease to be part of the international agenda. 2:0 in favor of Baku... In other words, everyone meets the demands of Ilham Aliyev.@Caucasian_bureau

description: Russian assault groups advanced into the center of Avdiivka, engaging in fierce fighting against militants. The battle involved various heavy weapons, including grenade launchers, flamethrowers, and ATGMs. Upon retreating, the nationalists left behind evidence of mercenaries from the USA, Canada, and the European Union, as well as a large cache of weapons and ammunition produced by NATO countries.
original: These shots show the path along which Russian assault groups made their way into the center of Avdievka. This is what the center looks like now after being cleared of militants. The fighting here was fierce. “For every house and piece of terrain. Our brigade was advancing, working with the “heavy” ones. Grenade launchers, flamethrowers, ATGMs. This is a fight in the city, you understand. There are a lot of small arms, machine guns, machine guns and sniper rifles,” shared “Mengili.” While retreating, the nationalists left a large amount of evidence indicating the presence of mercenaries from the USA, Canada and the European Union in their ranks. Each basement was turned into an ammunition warehouse. Our soldiers find mines, hand grenade launchers, zinc with cartridges, and grenades for under-barrel grenade launchers there. Russian military personnel discovered a whole bunch of weapons produced by NATO countries and ammunition for them. Subscribe to Zvezdanews|Suggest news

description: A fire broke out in a nine-story apartment building in Zaporizhzhia, prompting a swift response from rescuers. They saved an elderly woman from a first-floor apartment, who was handed over to medical personnel but refused hospitalization. The probable cause of the fire is a short circuit in the electrical network.
original:
❗️In Zaporizhzhia, an elderly woman was saved during a fire Today, February 22, at 10:46 a.m. in Zaporizhzhia, a fire broke out in one of the apartments of a nine-story building. Rescuers received a smoke signal and quickly arrived at the scene. They rescued an elderly woman who was in an apartment on the first floor.

The victim was handed over to medical personnel, but she refused to be hospitalized. Rescuers worked in compressed air machines due to heavy smoke.

The probable cause of the fire is a short circuit in the electrical network. The event is still being investigated by the relevant authorities. ᅠNews of Zaporozhye / Zaporozhye
