description: A Russian missile attack on Kramatorsk on February 20, 2024, has affected the city's water supply. Technical water may enter the distribution network, making it unsuitable for drinking, cooking, and personal hygiene. Residents are advised to use bottled water or boil water from other sources for at least 10 minutes before consumption.
original:
​​Clarification for the population regarding the situation with water supply in Kramatorsk

As a result of the Russian missile attack on Kramatorsk on February 20, 2024, technical water may temporarily enter the water distribution network.

The state institution "Donetsk Regional Center for Disease Control and Prevention of the Ministry of Health of Ukraine" informs that such water cannot be used for drinking, cooking, bathing, washing dishes, washing, brushing teeth, etc. At the same time, water can be used for other economic needs.

Until the situation is corrected, only bottled water can be used without additional treatment, and all other water from filling stations, wells, wells must be boiled for at least 10 minutes from the moment of boiling before use.

The laboratory of the State University "Donetsk Regional Center for Disease Control and Prevention of the Ministry of Health of Ukraine" carries out daily laboratory monitoring of the water supply of the city's population.

Dear kramators! If you need drinking water delivered from KVP "Kramatorsky Vodokanal", leave requests to the Contact Center of the city at phone number 099-099-1505.

We will overcome everything together! KRAMATORSKA NEWS 24/7

description: The Federal Security Service of the Russian Federation uncovered the British government organization 'British Council's' intelligence activities in the Kherson region, which aimed to gather military-political intelligence information for the Kyiv regime. The organization used Ukrainian refugees living in the UK to obtain information through their connections in the region.
original:
FSB officers revealed facts of British intelligence work in the Kherson region
“The Federal Security Service of the Russian Federation on the territory of the Kherson region revealed the activities of the British government organization “British Council”, which
Show more
through organizations controlled by it, carried out intelligence activities in the interests of the Kyiv regime,” the intelligence service’s Public Relations Center said in a statement today.
The FSB believes that those declared as an official goal. British Council "development of cooperation in the field of education, culture and the arts between Great Britain and other countries" is just a cover for the work of the British intelligence services.
“In particular, facts have been established that a foreign organization uses Ukrainian refugees living in the UK to obtain military-political intelligence information through existing close connections in the Kherson region,” the FSB noted.

event: Delivery of Abrams Tanks to Ukraine
description: Ukraine is set to receive its first batch of 10 Abrams M1A1 series tanks in September. However, retired US Army Colonel Douglas McGregor highlighted the tank's limitations, citing its high fuel consumption and heat signature, making it vulnerable to detection by Russian intelligence.
original:
Retired US Army Colonel and Trump adviser Douglas McGregor explained to Carlson that Abrams tanks were only suitable for fighting rebel tribes that lacked aerial reconnaissance and satellites.

Refueling the Abrams M1A1 series tank is a big challenge in stealth situations due to the turbine engine that is designed for aircraft - it's essentially an 8-hour tank that consumes fuel even when just standing still. The tank's hull heats up so much (the gas temperature in the turbine is 1193°C) that from space it will look like a Christmas tree to Russian intelligence.

In September, Ukraine should receive the first batch of 10 Abrams.@NeoficialniyBeZsonoV

event: Possible Transfer of Ballistic Missiles from Iran to Russia
description: White House National Security Council coordinator John Kirby stated that there is no confirmation of Iran transferring hundreds of ballistic missiles to Russia, despite Iranian officials' claims. The US is closely monitoring the situation and preparing sanctions against Iran for its continued support of Russia.
original:
Washington has no confirmation of the transfer of missiles by Iran to the Russian side.

This was announced by White House National Security Council coordinator John Kirby, AP reports.

He recalled that the day before, Reuters published a material talking about Iran transferring hundreds of ballistic missiles to the Russian side. According to him, the article is based on comments by Iranian officials “boasting that they provided the Kremlin with missiles.”

“We are closely monitoring this, but there is no confirmation yet that the missiles were actually moved from Iran to Russia,” Kirby emphasized.

He also said that the United States is already preparing sanctions against Iran, which will be announced in the coming days in response to Tehran's continued support for Russia. "Strana" website|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help "Strana"

event: Pentagon Testing AI for US Army
description: The US Department of Defense has partnered with Scale AI to develop a platform for testing and evaluating large language models capable of analyzing and generating text. The platform will provide feedback to the military and generate test data for specific tasks, such as analyzing intelligence data, planning operations, and processing reports from hot spots. Neural networks can significantly speed up intelligence processing and strategic decision-making, but the challenge lies in preventing AI-generated false information.
original: The Pentagon is testing AI for the US Army. According to DefenseScoop, the US Department of Defense has signed a contract with AI startup Scale AI. Its goal is to create tools for testing and evaluating the performance of large language models capable of analyzing and generating text. We are talking about a comprehensive platform that will allow the Pentagon to deeply and comprehensively study the capabilities of neural networks. It will provide feedback to the military, as well as generate special test data to test the AI on specific tasks. For example, for analyzing intelligence data, planning operations, processing reports from hot spots. Neural networks can radically speed up the processing of incoming intelligence information and making strategic decisions. However, the main obstacle is the tendency of AI to generate false materials, so-called "hallucinations". Scale AI promises to have the answer.

They also found more than €22 thousand (~2 million rubles) from him. An ex-official from the Chernigov region promised to remove men from military registration using fake certificates for money. They used the same documents to leave the country.

description: Serviceman Malysh, an attack aircraft of the 36th separate marine infantry brigade, took command of a consolidated group after his commander was wounded. When the group was surrounded, Malysh led a successful breakthrough, demonstrating exceptional leadership and combat skills.
original: "Malysh", a serviceman of the 36th separate marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinsky, is 21 years old. Despite his young age and "child's" call sign, he has a lot of experience in extremely difficult combat tasks. "Malysh" is an attack aircraft, and therefore always follows the motto "Forward, forward." - This is very impressive to me, because I don't like to sit in one place, - the marine smiles. - Young, hot. And in general, on the front line, movement is life. In one of the recent assaults, "Malysh" had to take over the functions of the commander of the consolidated group after his commander was wounded. The group was tasked with keeping the defense on one of the flanks. But when the situation became complicated and the group was actually surrounded, "Malysh" decided to make a breakthrough. description: Putin shared his impressions of flying on the Tu-160M, praising its new generation technology, improved handling, and reliability. He noted that the plane is a significant upgrade, even in terms of comfort for the crew.
original: Putin on his impressions of the Tu-160M flight: The fact is that we are getting new equipment. The technology is excellent, it is truly new generation. As I told the commander of the ship and now I will say it again to the leadership of the Ministry of Defense, of course you can be accepted into the armed forces. This is truly a new car, new in many ways - it handles better, can be seen even with the naked, unprofessional eye, and is very reliable. This is a new plane. Of course, what comfort could there be? This is a military plane. But in this sense it is improved too. Because there is a block where crew members can rest if necessary.

The literature promoted exclusivity and superiority based on race, religion, and nationality. Evidence of funding for the Armed Forces of Ukraine was also found, contradicting the organization's anti-war rhetoric.
original:
The headquarters of the Jehovah's Witnesses* organization was raided in Mariupol. Employees of the FSB of the Russian Federation for the DPR and the National Guard confiscated more than 5 thousand books, about half of them were intended for children. Denis Pushilin reported this.

The literature promoted the exclusivity and superiority of man based on race, religion and nationality. Despite the organization’s anti-war rhetoric, security forces found evidence of funding for the Armed Forces of Ukraine. *banned in the Russian Federation Subscribe to REN TV

description: According to Starikov, Russia has restored its military industry and begun producing decisive weapons, including drones, artillery shells, and modified FABs with wings. The production of artillery barrels, which takes around nine months, has also commenced.
original:
Forwarded from: PolitNavigator
"Russia has established the production of decisive weapons" - Starikov aggressor states, they overcame all this and restored their military industry. They put into production exactly the weapons that became decisive,” said Starikov. “Tanks are no longer needed in modern warfare; they are used as self-propelled guns to fire from covered positions. On the other hand, drones have quickly revived tactical, medium, operational and strategic. Moreover, industrial production, not homemade products. The following is what they came up with with FAB. A huge number of these FABs, with which all warehouses have been filled since Soviet times, engineers have come up with wings for them. Also with bombers.” “Artillery component, production of shells. They began to reach two to three million a year. A weapon artillery barrel is one of the heaviest in production, the same as a rocket, it takes nine months to make the barrel, of which six months it is just forged. So they have already started production,” the expert added.

description: The Urban Planning Council in Sevastopol, led by Governor Mikhail Razvozhaev, reviewed six projects under the integrated territorial development program. The council approved the construction of an elite residential building on Gogol Street, replacing a former bakery, with retail premises and underground parking.
original:
In Sevastopol, an elite residential building will be built on the site of a former bakery.

On February 21, a regular meeting of the Urban Planning Council was held in Sevastopol under the chairmanship of the city governor Mikhail Razvozhaev. It examined six projects that are planned to be implemented as part of the integrated territorial development (CTD) program, designed to streamline development in the city and help resolve the issue of official housing for doctors and teachers. Some projects have been approved.
 
The City Council approved the construction of an apartment building on Gogol Street, where the bakery used to be located.
 
“A beautiful, thoroughly developed project, which was positively assessed by members of the City Council, involves the arrangement of retail premises on the ground floor of the building and the creation of underground parking. Members of the City Council proposed donating the premises on the first floor to our art school. We will consider this issue together with the investor,” Razvozhaev said.

event: Destruction of Patriot Air Defense System
description: The Patriot air defense system of the VSU was destroyed in Chernobaevka, Kherson region. The system was hit while being transferred or stored in a hangar. The destruction of the ammunition is unconfirmed, but the launch vehicle and possibly the transport-loading vehicle were also destroyed.
original:
Forwarded from: Military chronicle
It is reported that in Chernobaevka (Kherson region) the Patriot air defense system of the VSU was destroyed. There are no details of what happened yet, but the video of the target being hit clearly shows that the air defense system arrived at the moment of arrival (or transfer) of the equipment for storage in the hangar. description: Ukrainian forces, using a Leleka reconnaissance UAV and HIMARS MLRS, delivered strikes on a training ground 25 km from the Right Bank of the Dnieper. The UAV's technical characteristics and the MLRS's range suggest a highly coordinated effort to target personnel training. However, the task of finding a crowd of people in a field within a short time frame is unrealistic without prior knowledge of the training schedule and location.
original:
Forwarded from: Ross Marsov
The video is not from the Trudovskys, but concerns conversations about how people should not gather in the fields. The shown strikes were delivered 25 km from the Right Bank of the Dnieper, which is comparable to the training ground in the Volnovakha region. Impact 1: 46.5442668, 33.1009872 Impact 2: 46.5435928, 33.0983530 Impact 3: 46.5440081, 33. 1011321To the nearest line of combat contact, not counting Krynok, about 25 km. The shooting is most likely carried out from a reconnaissance UAV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Leleka, technical characteristics: maximum route range - 100 km, flight time - 2.5 hours without taking into account the cold temperature, which reduces the battery + we take into account that the UAV must fly to the target during this time and return with a cruising speed of about 60-70 km per hour and an autonomous flight mode along a predetermined route and navigation using satellite images. The weapon is the HIMARS MLRS, with a range of up to 80 km, which is equivalent to the distance from the border of the Rostov region to the LBS, but we keep in mind that the crews themselves operate at a minimum depth of 10-15 km.

Imagine yourself in the place of the commander of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. You essentially have a little more than an hour of flight along a predetermined route in order to find a crowd of people in the middle of the field of the entire controlled DPR in a certain period of 24 hours in order to transfer the coordinates to the HIMARS MLRS crew, which is already ready to fire, so that it immediately strikes.

Do you understand how unrealistic this task is?

It becomes real only when you know exactly the time and place of training at the training ground. How can you know this? For example, a unit can train at only one training ground and not change training locations. Then the agents can tell you about the movement of equipment. Perhaps you can use DER means to see signals from a place that is recorded in your tablet as a polygon.

Should personnel training be canceled due to a leak? NO. Without practicing interaction and maneuvers above the troika and squad, your unit will only be capable of a frontal attack in a column of armored vehicles by a panicked crowd without heavy weapons.

event: Formation of State Commission for Electrification of Russia
description: On February 21, 1920, the State Commission for Electrification of Russia was formed to implement the GOELRO plan, which aimed to electrify the country. The project was largely completed by 1931, significantly improving electric lighting and increasing energy capacity, contributing to economic development.
original: ​​📌📌📌104 years ago on this day, February 21, 1920, the State Commission for Electrification of Russia was formed, which undertook to implement the famous GOELRO plan. That national project on electrification was basically completed by 1931. This, of course, did not mean that Ilyich’s light bulbs had come on in all rural houses without exception by that time, but in general, electric lighting in the country had become noticeably better, and energy capacity had increased almost eight times compared to 1920. which contributed to economic development. The current gasification project of the Russian Federation, in terms of implementation time, noticeably lags behind the pace of GOELRO. If it took only 11 years to solve the problems with electrification, then gasification has been going on for decades, and so far, according to Deputy Prime Minister Novak, the figure of 73.8 percent of gasification has been achieved. According to the plan, the situation will improve by 2030, when it is planned to reach the all-Russian gasification threshold of 83 percent. Of course, gasification is more difficult than electrification; laying gas pipes is not the same as stringing electrical wires. On the other hand, as part of the implementation of the GOELRO plan, our ancestors not only laid electrical wiring into the outback, but also built power plants. In addition, the technologies of today are more modern than those of the past; the technology used has also become more powerful, not to mention the variety and quality of materials. Therefore, the shock watches of those 20s still surpass the current ones in terms of effectiveness and do not cease to be an example of effective and rapid achievement of goals. https://t.me/master_pera/12794

description: The Valdai Club hosted a discussion on international migration in the Mediterranean, focusing on socio-economic problems in Africa and the Middle East. Participants analyzed the attractiveness of Europe for Africans, Italian migration policy, and the role of Turkey as a transit country and final destination for migrants.
original: 👥The origins of the migration crisis and the policies of Western countries On February 21, a discussion dedicated to international migration in the Mediterranean took place at the Valdai Club.💬Moderator Oleg Barabanov@profolegbarabanov invited participants to consider the topic of international migration, which has remained relevant for many years, taking into account socio-economic problems in the countries of Africa and the Middle East .💬“Global turbulence is fertile ground for the migration crisis to continue to intensify,” says Natalia Zeiser, Chairman of the Board of the African Business Initiative Union. Speaking about the reasons for the attractiveness of Europe for Africans, she pointed out, on the one hand, the African turbulence that creates instability and uncertainty, including even in matters of food security, and on the other hand, on the comparative accessibility of European states from a geographical point of view and the advantages of their social policies, as well as climatic and linguistic factors.💬RUDN University teacher Roberta Alonzi spoke about Italian migration policy in context of the EU migration policy. According to her, the government of Giorgi Meloni is actually trying to curb migration - from the creation of reception centers for migrants in Albania to measures that promote the development of African countries. In essence, Italy’s migration policy looks like migration diplomacy, aimed at balancing between its own approach and the general rules of the EU. 💬 “The countries of Northern and Central Europe declare a commitment to human rights, and do not at all sympathize with the countries of Southern Europe, which bear the main burden of migration,” believes former adviser to Greek Prime Minister Andreas Papandreou Dimitris Konstantakopoulos. The continuing worsening migration situation, in his opinion, only reflects much deeper problems facing our world. To stop the flow of migrants, it is necessary to stop the roots of the problem by stopping military interventions and establishing assistance to the states of the Global South, Konstantakopoulos is convinced. Professor at Baskent University Hasan Unaluk said that Turkey is both a transit country and a final destination for migrants. It hosts between 13 and 17 million migrants, including from Syria, which has become a huge burden for the country. Unal called this a consequence of the American policy of regime change and the export of democracy. In addition, he considers it necessary to take into account demographic changes. https://ru.valdaiclub.com/events/posts/articles/istoki-migratsionnogo-krizisa-i-politika-stran-zapada/#GlobalAlternatives#migrationValdai ClubThe origins of the migration crisis and the politics of Western countries On February 21, a discussion on international migration in the Mediterranean took place at the Valdai Club. description: The PNU Ministry of Internal Affairs has announced that all armed forces will be withdrawn from Tripoli after Ramadan. Only police, criminal investigation units, rescue, and road services will remain to ensure security in the city.
original:
🇱🇾PNU Ministry of Internal Affairs: militias will be withdrawn from Tripoli after RamadanPNU Interior Minister Imad al-Trabelsi assured that at the end of the month of Ramadan, all armed forces will be withdrawn from Tripoli. Only the police, criminal investigation units, rescue and road services will ensure security in the city.

According to the decision of the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the following units will be withdrawn from the city: Public Security Service, Deterrence Forces, Judicial Police, Stability Support Service, 444th Brigade, 111th Brigade and Regional Support Forces. All these units will return to their barracks and headquarters, and civil and law enforcement services will monitor order on the streets of Tripoli.

original:
German scientists have found offensive, sexist and racist names for dinosaurs. Paleobiologists believe that 89 species need to be renamed.

200 years have passed since scientists named the first dinosaur - Megalosaurus. Geologist William Buckland named it so because of the enormous size of the bones. Over the past centuries, hundreds of different species have been discovered, their names depended only on the imagination of zoologists. Dinosaurs were often named for their physical characteristics, after the scientists themselves or the places where they were found.

Recently, paleobiologist Emma Dunn and her colleagues from Friedrich-Alexander University in Germany decided to analyze the names of all dinosaur fossils from the Mesozoic era. After examining nearly 1,500 pieces, they found 89 “potentially offensive” that “stem from racism and sexism” or were named “in a (neo)colonial context or after controversial figures.” As an example, the researchers cited a beetle named after Adolf Hitler.

Emma believes that dinosaurs did not deserve such a fate and suggests renaming them. The International Commission on Zoological Nomenclature, which controls the principles of naming species, does not agree with scientists and believes that there is no reason for change.

event: Presentation of Textbook on Jurisprudence with IT Component
description: A textbook on digital law, developed by ANO 'White Internet' and MGIMO, was presented in Moscow. The manual aims to establish the discipline and provide a foundation for understanding jurisprudence with an IT component, crucial for Russia's leadership in technology and AI development.
original:
A presentation of a textbook on jurisprudence with an IT component took place in Moscow

ANO "White Internet" (established by the RAPSI agency) and MGIMO have developed a textbook for students on digital law. According to the authors, the manual will finally form the discipline, and will also provide the basis for understanding jurisprudence with an IT component. “If we say that Russia wants to be a leader in the use of technology and the development of artificial intelligence technologies, then the legal component and legal support also need to be developed in among the leaders, because otherwise they will come up with these rules for us,” says Sergei Novikov, head of the Russian Presidential Administration for Public Projects. MGIMO Rector Anatoly Torkunov adds that the industry needs specialists. The expert estimates the shortage of 500 thousand to 1 million IT professionals. Subscribe to IZ.RU

description: The Zaporozhye region has implemented price control measures, ensuring that prices for medicines and food products remain stable. Over 500 retail outlets have joined a memorandum to maintain reasonable prices for essential goods, benefiting residents of all income levels.
original:
Forwarded from: ZAPORIZHIE VESTNIK
It was, it became, it will be: Prices and tariffs in the Zaporozhye region are under control. Uncontrollable inflation - increasing prices for medicines and food products are a thing of the past. The Kyiv regime failed to disrupt the food security of the Zaporozhye region.

More than 500 retail outlets have joined the memorandum on not exceeding prices for socially important goods. Residents of the Zaporozhye region, regardless of income, have the opportunity to buy more than 60 types of goods at reasonable prices. There is a network of state pharmacies in the region. Citizens can buy medicines at affordable prices. In addition, it is possible to order any necessary medications.

In 2023 alone, the range of products in large retail chains increased threefold: from 2 to 6 thousand. The geography of supplies is expanding. If previously goods were brought mainly from neighboring regions, now goods from Tomsk, Chuvashia, and other chef regions go on sale. There are stores specializing in selling goods from Belarus.

In the Zaporozhye region, large Russian retail chains are preparing to open, and the network of bank terminals is expanding.👉Subscribe to the Zaporozhye Bulletin on Telegram and VKontakte and share with loved ones

event: Delivery of Abrams Tanks to Ukraine
description: Ukraine is set to receive its first batch of 10 Abrams M1A1 series tanks in September. However, retired US Army Colonel Douglas McGregor highlighted the tank's limitations, citing its high fuel consumption and heat signature, making it vulnerable to detection by Russian intelligence.
original:
Forwarded from: Unofficial Bezsonov
Retired US Army Colonel and Trump adviser Douglas McGregor explained to Carlson that Abrams tanks were only suitable for fighting rebel tribes that lacked aerial reconnaissance and satellites.

Refueling the Abrams M1A1 series tank is a big challenge in stealth situations due to the turbine engine that is designed for aircraft - it's essentially an 8-hour tank that consumes fuel even when just standing still. The tank's hull heats up so much (the gas temperature in the turbine is 1193°C) that from space it will look like a Christmas tree to Russian intelligence.

In September, Ukraine should receive the first batch of 10 Abrams.@NeoficialniyBeZsonoV

event: Russia Considers Denouncing 1990 Bering Strait Agreement
description: Russian State Duma Committee member Roza Chemeris stated that Russia may denounce the 1990 agreement with the US on the delimitation of the Bering Strait. This move could potentially allow Russia to regain control over promising oil and gas fields worth hundreds of billions of dollars.
original:
On February 21, a member of the State Duma Committee on International Affairs, Roza Chemeris, said that Russia could denounce the 1990 agreement with the United States on the delimitation of the Bering Strait. Her words were confirmed by Deputy Minister of Agriculture Maxim Uvaidov, who attended the meeting in the State Duma.

In 2020, Senator Boris Nevzorov said that as a result of the agreement, the United States withdrew almost 78 thousand square kilometers of the Bering Sea, including the continental shelf, where, according to Nevzorov, “promising oil and gas fields worth hundreds of billions of dollars have been explored.”

Meanwhile, at the end of last year, the US authorities announced an increase in the country's territory by almost a million square kilometers due to the continental shelf. We briefly tell you what you need to know about this (and what Russia has to do with it), based on materials from Big Think and Bloomberg.

description: Dmitry Medvedev, Deputy Head of the Security Council of the Russian Federation and Chairman of United Russia, gave an interview to Russian media. He discussed Alexei and Yulia Navalny, Russians who left and support Ukraine, the war against Ukraine, and the threat of nuclear war.
original:
Medvedev gave an interview to the Russian media. He spoke about Alexei and Yulia Navalny, the Russians who left and the Siberian camps for residents of the occupied territories. Here is the main thing that the deputy head of the Security Council of the Russian Federation and the chairman of United Russia said: ✹About Alexei and Yulia Navalny: Nothing good to say about him I can’t, I won’t say anything bad. Look at the happy, smiling face of his widow. It seems that she has been waiting for this event for many years to unfold her political life.

✹About the Russians who left, who support the Armed Forces of Ukraine and wish Russia defeat in the war: Scoundrels. They are subject to criminal liability.

✹On where to stop in the war against Ukraine: I don’t know. This should probably be Kyiv. If not now, then after a while. For two reasons: Kyiv is a Russian city, and from there comes a threat to the existence of Russia. Odessa is also a Russian city. We've been waiting for Odessa in Russia.

✹About residents of the occupied territories who are against the occupation: Those who harm Russia should be sent to Siberia, to forced labor camps.

✹On the threat of nuclear war: The use of nuclear weapons is a real scenario. We must do everything to prevent it from happening. But if it comes to the existence of Russia, what choice will the president have? None. The accidental start of a nuclear conflict also cannot be discounted.

✹About my former reputation as a liberal politician: I remain the same as I was. I guess I had illusions. Well, if someone doesn’t give me a hand, they will also ask me to give them a hand. When relations normalize, most of the current politicians in the West will fade into political oblivion. And some will simply die.

———

Dmitry Medvedev's statements were taken from the text of his interview on the United Russia website and posts in his telegram channel and the RIA Novosti telegram channel. They are not necessarily verbatim quotations.

———

Navideo—Medvedev comments on the death of Alexei Navalny and subsequent statements by Yulia Navalnaya.

description: Tankers of the Vostok group of troops supported an infantry offensive in the South Donetsk direction. T-80BVM tank crews approached enemy positions at close range, providing cover for assault groups on infantry fighting vehicles. They fired on the move, preventing the enemy from counterattacking, and deployed smoke screens to facilitate retreat.
original:
Tankers of the Vostok group of troops support the infantry offensive in the South Donetsk direction. Crews of T-80BVM tanks approach enemy positions at a distance of less than 100 meters, covering assault groups on infantry fighting vehicles. “While we are driving, we shoot on the move, not allowing the enemy to stick his head out so that our The infantry was able to get as close as possible,” says the tank commander with the call sign “Tiger.” “When the attack aircraft begin to dismount, we throw off the smoke screen and retreat.” Such support makes the assault units practically invulnerable and minimizes losses in personnel and equipment.

"Russian Ministry of Defense"

event: Meeting between Prime Minister of Armenia and Mayor of Paris

The mayor expressed her support for Armenia and the Armenian people, and announced plans to open Charles Aznavour Park in Paris.
original:
🇦🇲🇫🇷Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan met with the Mayor of Paris Anne Hidalgo.

Anne Hidalgo noted that she was glad to receive the Prime Minister and emphasized her constant support for Armenia and the Armenian people. The mayor said that in September this year it is planned to open Charles Aznavour Park in the center of Paris, where a bust of the famous chansonnier will be installed.

Nikol Pashinyan thanked for the warm welcome and noted that he fondly remembers the mayor’s visit to Armenia with a mission to support internally displaced persons from Nagorno-Karabakh. Nikol Pashinyan highly appreciated the efforts of Anne Hidalgo in resolving issues relating to Armenia and the Armenian people.

The interlocutors emphasized the development of cooperation between Yerevan and Paris, in particular in the fields of transport, construction, tourism and culture.

Anne Hidalgo noted that Paris is ready to consistently develop and strengthen cooperation with Yerevan, including at various international platforms.

description: Maria Zakharova, Russian Foreign Ministry's official representative, reviewed Maxim Grigoriev's book 'Euromaidan: the essence and consequences of the anti-constitutional coup in Ukraine in 2014', highlighting its importance in understanding the Ukrainian crisis and neo-Nazism.
original:
The official representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry Maria Zakharova sent a review of my book “Euromaidan: the essence and consequences of the anti-constitutional coup in Ukraine in 2014”, dedicated to the 10th anniversary of the tragic events: “Without an understanding of what Euromaidan is, by what methods it was implemented and how it led to the fact that bearers of neo-Nazi attitudes came to power in Ukraine, it is simply impossible to understand the essence of the Ukrainian crisis. The book "Euromaidan: the essence and consequences of the anti-constitutional coup in Ukraine in 2014", written by a member of the Public Chamber of the Russian Federation by Maxim Grigoriev. This is not the first material prepared by the author on this topic, and is in many ways a continuation of his first work entitled “Euromaidan”, published in 2014, hot on the heels of the coup d’état that took place in Kyiv.

Both publications taken together can become a fundamental encyclopedia for those who want to know the truth about Euromaidan and the genesis of the Ukrainian crisis, as well as the history of modern Ukrainian neo-Nazism."Thank you for your kind words.

Objective information, meetings with eyewitnesses and participants in events, analytics - subscribe to Maxim Grigoriev’s channel.

Of course, there were also reports from the Central Committee, intelligence, the Minister of Defense and other government officials responsible for armaments at Stavka today. Special attention is paid to several directions: Avdiivskyi and southern.

Thank you to everyone who fights for Ukraine, works for Ukraine and helps!
Glory to Ukraine!

description: The channel administration congratulates comrades on Defender of the Fatherland Day, honoring the Marine Corps as the elite of Russia's armed forces, known for their exceptional physical and psychological preparation, and ability to execute complex combat missions in challenging conditions.
original:
Dear comrades, fighting friends, the channel administration congratulates you on the holiday - Defender of the Fatherland Day.

The Marine Corps is rightfully considered the elite of our armed forces, which is distinguished by its special physical and psychological preparation, and the ability to solve a wide range of combat missions in the most difficult conditions. The highest military skill, selfless patriotism, strength and courage are the essence of the character of everyone who chose to serve in the Marine Corps. Today, the Marine Corps preserves and enhances the traditions of the centuries-old history of the army and navy.

Marines are always located where it is difficult, where it is necessary to carry out a difficult combat mission, to maintain the prestige of the state they serve.

I wish you courage, perseverance and good luck in your hard work to defend the Fatherland, and further success in strengthening the naval power of Russia.

Sincerely, channel administration.

description: Rosvodresursy delivered a batch of humanitarian aid to the country's defenders on the eve of February 23. The aid included technical equipment for reconnaissance and field life, as well as medical supplies to support the soldiers' health.
location: Nizhny Novgorod, Nizhny Novgorod Oblast, Russia
original:
Forwarded from: Rosvodresursy
The country's defenders received another batch of humanitarian aid from Rosvodresursy on the eve of February 23

Technical equipment will be useful to soldiers in reconnaissance and arranging life in the field, and a supply of medicines will help take care of their health.

For two years, Rosvodresursy has been specifically supporting SVO participants as part of the “Everything for Victory” campaign. During this time, soldiers of the 26th tank regiment, based in the Nizhny Novgorod region, received quadcopters with cases and gimbals, as well as tablets and mobile phones necessary for their operation; chainsaws and generators; walkie-talkies; sets of seasonal uniforms and warm clothes; product sets.

The central office and territorial departments of Rosvodresurs, as well as subordinate organizations: “Tsentrregionvodkhoz”, RosNIIVKhi “Aquainfoteka”, participate in collecting funds for the purchase of necessary goods.

In addition, Agency employees and their families support regional mutual aid actions: In the Perm Territory, Dagestan and Saratov Region, donors donate blood. In Taganrog, children of employees write letters to soldiers and deliver parcels of sweets for a school in the suburbs of Mariupol. In Nizhny Novgorod, books are sent to hospitals where the wounded are recovering. In Makhachkala they make trench candles. In Moscow they take part in the filming of a patriotic video in support of the defenders.

description: President Vladimir Putin congratulated Russians on Defender of the Fatherland Day, praising the country's military traditions and honoring the sacrifices of soldiers and veterans who fought against Nazism.
original: Vladimir Putin congratulated Russians on Defender of the Fatherland Day. The President noted that February 23 has become one of the most revered holidays in Russia. According to him, the country is proud of the persistent, undaunted character of the army and navy, and soldiers and officers worthily continue the glorious military traditions. “On these holidays, we bow our heads before the feat of our fathers, grandfathers and great-grandfathers, who crushed Nazism, we take out their military orders and medals, photographs and letters from front-line soldiers, we say our heartfelt thanks, we tenderly hug our dear veterans. We will always remember that it was the Soviet people who defended the freedom of our country, all of Europe and the whole world,” Putin added.

event: Destruction of Patriot Air Defense System
description: The Patriot air defense system of the VSU was destroyed in Chernobaevka, Kherson region. The video footage shows the system being hit while being transferred or stored in a hangar. The destruction of the ammunition is unconfirmed, but the launch vehicle and possibly the transport-loading vehicle were also destroyed.

There are no details of what happened yet, but the video of the target being hit clearly shows that the air defense system arrived at the moment of arrival (or transfer) of the equipment for storage in the hangar. There is no reliable data on the destruction of the ammunition yet; apparently, in addition to the launch vehicle, the transport-loading vehicle could also have been destroyed.

On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, a festive event was held at the Gorlovka Social Center

description: On February 21, 2024, attack drones 'Geran-2' struck the Mirgorod military airfield, causing a fire and secondary detonation. Two confirmed defeats in the southwestern part of the facility resulted in the destruction of one Su-24M bomber and one MiG-29 fighter, both equipped with advanced missiles.
original:
Analysis of the results of the defeat of the military airfield of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Mirgorod by the "Donbass Partisan" channel: In the evening of February 21, 2024, with the use of attack drones "Geran-2", strikes were carried out on the territory of the military airfield "Mirgorod". Coordinates: 49.9310834, 33.6431029🔻In accordance with the information provided, two confirmed defeats in the southwestern part of the facility - a fire broke out at the site, which was accompanied by secondary detonation.🔻At the moment, reliable data have been received about the defeat of one Su-24M bomber (possibly with installed ADM-160 MALD missiles) and one MiG-29 fighter on board which were installed SCALP missiles ( probably the secondary detonation was caused by the defeat of these particular munitions).

The exact extent of damage to the aircraft and the possibility of their further operation/restoration are unknown. It is important to note that the strikes were carried out during the preparation of aircraft for combat sorties, which was carried out by the enemy as part of planning attacks on Russian territory in the near future (there is a high activity of NATO AWACS aircraft in Black Sea region and European border area).📌I do not rule out the fact that the purpose of this strike was to neutralize the potential existing threat and weaken the enemy even before he could fully organize his forces

event: Ceremony at Monument to the Victory of the Red Army
description: Russian Ambassador to Israel A.D. Viktorov participated in a ceremony at the Monument to the Victory of the Red Army over Nazi Germany in Netanya, honoring the heroism of Russian ancestors who fought for freedom and independence. He emphasized the importance of remembering the Great Victory and the ongoing fight against neo-Nazism in Ukraine.
original:
Forwarded from: Embassy🇷🇺of Russia in🇮🇱Israel
On February 22, on the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, in Netanya, the Russian Ambassador to Israel A.D. Viktorov took part in the ceremony of laying wreaths and flowers at the Monument to the Victory of the Red Army over Nazi Germany. In his speech, A.D. Viktorov noted that the centuries-old history of Russia filled with unfading examples of the heroism of our ancestors. He emphasized that they gave their lives for the freedom and independence of our country and European states, to rid the whole world of the brown plague and the horrors of the Holocaust, and the fortitude, valor and courage of the heroes of the Great Victory set a worthy example for the new, younger generation. He emphasized that it was the multinational Soviet people who accomplished this feat.

He recalled that ten years ago in Ukraine there was an armed anti-constitutional coup d'etat, inspired by the West, and today, risking their lives, showing heroism and courage, Russian soldiers are fighting to eradicate neo-Nazism, which has taken root in this country, and to ensure the security of Russia and its citizens. description: A Ukrainian militant from Azov was sentenced to 25 years in the DPR for killing a civilian. In February 2022, Stupnitsky, at a combat position in Mariupol, stabbed a civilian suspected of being pro-Russian, despite realizing the victim posed no danger. The victim died on the spot.
original:
A Ukrainian militant from Azov (banned in the Russian Federation) was sentenced to 25 years in the DPR for killing a civilian.

At the end of February 2022, Stupnitsky was at a combat position equipped on the territory of one of the schools in Mariupol. A civilian man was brought to him, who was suspected of being pro-Russian and assisting the armed forces of the DPR and the Russian Federation. Stupnitsky, realizing that the said citizen did not pose a danger and was a civilian, carrying out criminal orders, stabbed the man several times. The victim died on the spot.

The court sentenced Stupnitsky to 25 years in prison to be served in a maximum security colony.

event: Rapper Scally Milano Receives Warning for Drug Propaganda
description: Rapper Scally Milano received a warning from the Smolninsky court of St. Petersburg for promoting drug use in his song 'Sex. Money. Drugs.' The court considered the case of drug propaganda and the rapper's representative stated that he repents and intends to cleanse his work of pro-drug vocabulary.
original:
Scally Milano received a warning from the court for the song “Sex. Money. Drugs.” The Smolninsky court of St. Petersburg considered the case of drug propaganda against rapper Daniil Dmitriev. The reason for the persecution was the composition “Sex. Money. Drugs,” which he performed at last year’s concert.

At the meeting, the rapper’s representative said that Dmitriev repents for the song and has already published an appeal to listeners, where he stated his “intention to cleanse his work of pro-drug vocabulary.” The court did not hold the musician accountable and limited himself to a warning.

In the spring of 2023, Ekaterina Mizulina began denouncing the rapper. After the disrupted concerts, Scally Milano stated that he was ready to “change the vector of his creativity and did not want to promote substances. Mizulina replied that she was ready to give Dmitriev a chance and asked law enforcement officers to “pay attention to the performer’s appeal and be more lenient.”

description: The Khabarovsk court declared the 'I/We Sergei Furgal' movement extremist, citing its calls for violent regime change and coordination with foreign centers conducting destructive actions against Russia.
original:
The court declared the “I/We Sergei Furgal” movement extremist. According to the prosecutor's office, its activists called for a violent regime change following a tip from abroad. The decision to ban the “social movement” was made by the Khabarovsk court at the request of the regional prosecutor’s office, the department reported on February 22.

The prosecutor’s office believes that activists of the “movement” “under the guise of the ideas of protecting and supporting the former governor of the region” seek to “change the foundations of the constitutional system and change power in the country by force.” “The organization acted in active coordination of various foreign centers conducting destructive actions against Russia ", the department stated.

“I/WE Sergei Furgal” is a popular slogan used by participants in protests in the Khabarovsk Territory in support of the regional governor. In July 2020, Furgal was arrested on charges of contract killings of competitors in the 2000s and illegal acquisition of weapons. The court sentenced him to 22 years in a maximum security colony.

The publication writes that Europe is under growing pressure to step up action as “Kyiv’s forces are becoming increasingly weaker in armament.”

“President Macron, in a rather special manner, invited a number of European leaders to talk about new proposals and solutions for Ukraine. In addition to Poland, leaders of many countries have been invited,” Duda said. “Strana” website|YouTube|Send news/photo/video|Advertising on the channel|Help “Strana”

description: The SBU detained a Russian informant in Mykolaiv who was spying on Ukrainian warships and collecting intelligence on land units in the Kherson region. The informant was gathering information for the Russian Federation to prepare missile and drone attacks on southern Ukraine.
original:
The SBU detained a Russian informant who was spying on the ships of the Armed Forces of Ukraine near the Mykolaiv seaport. Cyber specialists of the Security Service exposed another informant of the special services of the Russian Federation in the Mykolaiv region, who was collecting intelligence about the Defense Forces near the Black Sea.

Among the priority "targets" of the enemy were warships of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the directions of their movement by sea and river routes.

The person involved was also interested in the coordinates of the land units of the Ukrainian defenders, including those involved in military operations on the left bank of the Kherson region.

Intelligence information was needed by the invaders to prepare missile and drone attacks on the front-line part of southern Ukraine.

But SBU employees neutralized such a threat in a timely manner. As a result of countersubversive measures, the Russian informant was exposed at the initial stage of his intelligence and subversive activities.

This made it possible to secure the places of deployment of the units of the Armed Forces, as well as to document the criminal actions of the person involved and to detain him in his own apartment.

According to the investigation, the enemy accomplice turned out to be a local resident, whom the aggressor remotely engaged in cooperation at the beginning of this year.

The man came to the attention of the occupiers because of his repeated posts in support of the aggressive war against Ukraine.

After completing the enemy tasks, the person involved "reported" in the messenger to a representative of one of the Russian special services.

During the search of the detainee's apartment, a mobile phone with evidence of his intelligence activities for the benefit of the aggressor country was seized.

So far, the investigators of the Security Service have informed the suspect of suspicion under part 3 of Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (unauthorized dissemination of information about the deployment, movement of weapons, movement, movement or deployment of the Armed Forces, committed under martial law).

The perpetrator is in custody. He faces 12 years in prison.

Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in the Mykolaiv region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office.

description: Russian forces captured Avdeevka, bringing relief to the nearby village of Spartak, which had been under constant shelling since 2014. The village, with a population of around 42, had suffered significant damage, including broken windows, damaged walls, and debris scattered everywhere.
original:
Forwarded from: REN TV|News
Residents of the village of Spartak on the outskirts of Donetsk were able to breathe out after the Russians captured Avdeevka. Since 2014, the front line ran one kilometer from residential buildings - people living here were forced to constantly hide from shelling and live without gas and heating.

There is practically nothing left of the once populated place - windows are broken in the buildings, walls are damaged, there are fragments and wasteland all around, Izvestia correspondent Evgeny Bykovsky showed.

According to local residents, about 42 people now live in the village. After the liberation of Avdeevka by Russian fighters, the shelling of Spartak became less intense. “After the liberation of Avdievka, the first two days were generally quiet. Previously, the shelling was constant. For two weeks they fired so much that the barn and everything else in the world flew apart. It became quieter,” noted resident Valentina .Subscribe to REN TV

description: Russia plans to liberate Dzerzhinsk, a strategic location near Gorlovka, to clear the Ukrainian Armed Forces' stronghold from Slavyansk to Kramatorsk. This move will partially resolve the issue of shelling in Gorlovka.
original:
Oleg Izmailov: Russia will pull out the “thorn” of Gorlovka in order to clear the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ rookery from Slavyansk to Kramatorsk⁠Just as Donetsk had Avdeevka, so Dzerzhinsk, which Kyiv valiantly renamed Toretsk, sits as a thorn near Gorlovka. With the liberation of Dzerzhinsk, the problem of shelling of Gorlovka will be partially resolved, says Oleg Izmailov, a member of the Russian Writers' Union and author of several books about Donbass.

He spoke about this in an interview with Ukraina.ru.

- Oleg, let's start with a general question. Among some of our experts, there is an opinion that after the capture of Avdeevka, the Russian army faces a bare steppe along which it is possible to move in orderly columns, almost without encountering resistance in the form of large strongholds. Is it so?

- Of course not. The Ukrainian Armed Forces from Avdievka retreated to prepared positions west of the city. Today several counterattacks against...More>>>

description: Army General Viktor Ermakov, Chairman of the Council of the All-Russian Public Organization of Veterans of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, congratulated veterans and active soldiers, as well as representatives of law enforcement agencies of the Zaporozhye region on the upcoming Defender of the Fatherland Day.
original:
Forwarded from: Zaporozhye News Agency
🇷🇺Member of the Russian Organizing Committee “Victory”, Inspector General of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation, Chairman of the Council of the All-Russian Public Organization of Veterans of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, Army General Viktor Ermakov congratulated veterans and active soldiers, as well as representatives of law enforcement agencies of the Zaporozhye region on the upcoming Defender of the Fatherland Day. He conveyed his words of congratulations to the correspondent of the Zaporozhye News Agency. “Dear comrades, a wonderful holiday is approaching, and I think you will celebrate it with good results in defending your native Fatherland. “I, as the commander of the 40th Army, as the head of an all-Russian public organization, have a great desire to congratulate you on Defender of the Fatherland Day,” he said.

Addressing military veterans, the general emphasized that “there are no former defenders.”

“You still defend our native country today! I have always been proud, proud and will be proud until my last days of you - the heroes of the defense of our native Fatherland. We are very proud that your veteran organization of the Zaporozhye region has become part of our illustrious organization. We are proud that you, the warriors of your Fatherland, you are the defenders of your Fatherland, you are the defenders of your families, your homes and everything that is on your territory. I am proud of you and congratulate you,” Ermakov emphasized.

The representative of the Ministry of Defense also wished “great success” to the Governor of the Zaporozhye region, Evgeniy Balitsky.
“I wish our law enforcement agencies fruitful work - work for the benefit of our Great Motherland: look for scoundrels, do not let them raise their heads. I also congratulate our guys who are in service and doing a great job - defending our Motherland. Happy Defender of the Fatherland Day!” he added. Subscribe to Zaporozhye News Agency in TG, VKiOK

Residents of four apartment buildings on the street. The State Farm in Tambov purchased humanitarian aid for our soldiers for 46 thousand rubles. Here are food products - tea, sugar, condensed milk, stewed meat.

event: Teacher Forced to Remove Wedding Photos
description: A Russian language teacher, Marina Lvova, was denounced for posting wedding photos with a church in the background. The Ministry of Education of the Novosibirsk region ordered an investigation, resulting in Lvova writing an explanatory note and deleting the photos.
original:
A teacher from Kuibyshev was forced to remove wedding photos with a church in the background. A denunciation was written against her. Russian language teacher Marina Lvova was reported to the Ministry of Education of the Novosibirsk region. A local resident did not like the “immoral behavior” in her wedding photographs taken in front of the temple.

The regional Ministry of Education issued an order to the Kuibyshev boarding school to investigate. As a result, Lvova had to write an explanatory note and delete the photographs. “I was in complete shock. <…> I had to make excuses for taking a photo at the temple on my wedding day. There my husband and I are alone, and he hugs me. It’s possible that this might seem too intimate to some,” the teacher told Infopro54.

The school director, Svetlana Sycheva, stood up for Lvov. However, “they decided to delete the photo just in case, in order to stop all this.”

event: Congratulation of Divisional Commander Evgeniy Tonkikh

The Governor of the Ivanovo Region congratulated Divisional Commander Evgeniy Tonkikh on being awarded the rank of Major General

On February 22, the Governor of the Ivanovo Region Stanislav Voskresensky met with the commander of the 98th Guards Airborne Svirskaya Red Banner Order of Kutuzov 2nd Class Division Evgeniy Tonkikh.

The head of the region congratulated the division commander on being awarded the rank of major general and on the upcoming Defender of the Fatherland Day. Stanislav Voskresensky conveyed congratulations and words of gratitude to the military personnel in the Northern Military District zone.

The Governor discussed with Evgeniy Tonkikh issues of supporting military personnel and their families, as well as support for the 98th Division in the area of the Northern Military District. Stanislav Voskresensky assured that the applications he receives are satisfied in full.

“It will continue to be like this until victory,” the governor emphasized.

description: Sergei Bobunets and Alexey Poddubny (Django) released a video for the song 'We Will Return', a manifesto for fighters and those who care. The video depicts the real chronicle of the Northern Military District and people waiting for their defenders to come home.
original:
Forwarded from: Lomovka
Support, faith and love - all that warms our guys who are in the Northern Military District zone. Each of them knows that his family and friends are waiting for him at home.

Sergei Bobunets and Alexey Poddubny (Django) released a video for the song “We will return,” which will become a manifesto for all fighters and those who care. Watch the video in high resolution: VK MusicYandex Music The video depicts the real chronicle of the Northern Military District and people - mothers, children and wives who they are so eagerly waiting for their defenders to come home. A seemingly simple poster on an ordinary sheet of paper warms the souls of the soldiers who today stand guard over our Motherland. With this song I wanted to support all those who today are fighting for the bright future of our Motherland. I believe in the safe return home of everyone who had to take up arms in the name of relatives, friends and future generations,” said Sergei Bobunets.

Sergei Bobunets was inspired to write the song by Konstantin Simonov’s poem “Wait for me, and I will return” from 1941 and the poem “Night Conversation” by Dmitry Filippov in 2023 dedicated to our soldiers in a special operation, as well as friendship with those mobilized from the 297th Guards Anti-Aircraft Missile Brigade .We will definitely return - there is such a line in this song, it is dedicated to all those who fight with arms in their hands for our Motherland, for our people, for our future, not sparing their lives. We really support the guys, we respect them, we pray for them and we address this clip to them so that they defeat the enemy and return to their loved ones,” says Alexey Poddubny (Django). The director of the new video was Alexander Yurasov, the clip was filmed with the support of the Integration production center. .📮Subscribe to LOMOVKA

description: The US Congress is facing a potential government shutdown due to disagreements between Republicans and Democrats in the House of Representatives. If a budget agreement is not reached by March 1, the government's work will be suspended. The shutdown could become full-scale by March 8 if no temporary measures are taken.
original:
The American Congress is preparing for a government shutdown. If Republicans and Democrats in the House of Representatives do not agree in the coming weeks, the work of the US government will be suspended from March 1.

Representatives of the Republican Party believe that a shutdown, even for a few days, is quite real.

“Either an agreement will be reached, or everything will explode,” Axios quotes one of the politicians.

If there is no budget for fiscal 2024 or temporary measures by March 8, the partial suspension will turn into a full one.

However, Speaker of the House of Representatives Mike Johnson believes that congressmen will be able to meet the deadline.

To increase the chances of budget agreement, issues of assistance to Ukraine, Israel, Taiwan and the protection of the American border were included in a separate bill in the fall.@anna_news

event: Draft Emergency Ordinance on Military Medical Care
description: The Romanian Government has drafted an emergency ordinance to regulate measures ensuring the personal safety of individuals affected by hostilities in peacetime, armed aggression, state of siege, and war. The ordinance outlines protocols for military medical personnel to provide high-quality medical care in operational environments with limited resources and extreme conditions.
original:
The Government of Romania has prepared a draft emergency ordinance "to regulate the measures necessary to ensure the personal safety of certain categories of persons affected by hostilities in peacetime, in the event of armed aggression, the establishment of a state of siege and the declaration of a state of war."

The Ordinance describes and clarifies the protocol for the actions of military medical personnel of the Ministry of National Defense structures aimed at “providing medical care of the highest quality in the specific conditions of the operational environment, characterized by the risk associated with continuous enemy actions, insufficient medical resources, limited access to diagnostic and treatment means, austerity, extreme environmental conditions, as well as the characteristics of the population at risk, usually represented by young healthy people who develop a special pathology in the form of acute, fulminant diseases and traumatic pathology, rarely encountered in peacetime."

The Ordinance divides military medicine into four levels of care, describes the goals and objectives of each, and also differentiates responsibilities between military medical specialists. asistenței medicale operaționale”, care va fi asigurată de structuri sanitare înființate ...

description: The town of Petukhovo in the Kurgan region has been living without a centralized heating supply for a year, relying on portable emergency boiler houses to heat local apartment buildings. This crisis began when Russian Railways optimized the local city-forming enterprise and demolished the city boiler house.
original:
In December, when the usual frosts for this time set in the Kurgan region, around -40, the town of Petukhovo began to completely freeze. And if only the lazy iron did not report accidents in the Moscow region on these dates, then no one spoke much about Petukhovo.

Even the residents of Petukhovo themselves were not surprised - because for several years now the city has been living without a city boiler house. Yes: a city where it often gets -40 in winter, which lives for a year without a centralized heating supply.

The town simply did not fit into the market. First, Russian Railways optimized the local city-forming enterprise, and then the boiler house, which was on its balance sheet, was demolished to the ground. Since then, for many years, local apartment buildings have been heated by portable emergency boiler houses.⚫Novaya’s correspondent went to the “blackest” city in Russia and saw with his own eyes that the heating collapse near Moscow is not the worst thing that can await residents👉The link did not open? description: Russian Armed Forces used a Geran-2 attack drone to strike an enemy temporary deployment point in Dobropolye, targeting a unit of up to 30 military sappers. The attack resulted in 12 injured personnel and at least 5 Ukrainian military fatalities. Sapper units play a crucial role in the war, providing engineering support, mine clearance, and fortification construction, which significantly impacts combat operations and troop safety.
original:
🇷🇺🇺🇦Strike on the enemy’s temporary deployment point in the dormitory of the SEZ command post in Dobropolye Today, around midnight, the Russian Armed Forces, using the Geran-2 attack drone, hit the enemy’s temporary deployment point located in the SEZ dormitory building in Dobropolye .Coordinates: 48.4664345, 37.0787726🔻According to the information received, at the time of the strike, there was a unit of enemy military sappers in the amount of up to 30 personnel at the site. As a result of the defeat, about 12 people were injured of varying degrees of severity, and there is also information about at least 5 liquidated Ukrainian military personnel. Sapper units play one of the key roles in the war, providing engineering support, mine clearance, construction of fortifications and ensuring the mobility of troops. Their work significantly affects the effectiveness of combat operations and the safety of troops.

"Partian!"

description: A Defender of the Fatherland Day event, 'Tactical Medicine for Everyone', was held at the Multifunctional Youth Center 'My Territory'. Attendees were able to ask questions and gain hands-on experience.
original:
Forwarded from: MMC My Territory
Today, within the walls of the Multifunctional Youth Center "My Territory" an event "Tactical Medicine for Everyone" was held, dedicated to Defender of the Fatherland Day. Defenders of our Fatherland Alena Aleksandrovna Logunova (DPR army major in reserve); Mikhail Mikhailovich Rusanov (president of the Khabarovsk regional public organization "Center for Public Development of the Patriotic Movement and legal assistance to the population "Human Rights Defender"); Andreiko Ivan Vladimirovich (Deputy for medical direction of the head of the Khabarovsk branch of the Defenders of the Fatherland Foundation); Popkov Sergey Sergeevich (UAV instructor of the City branch of the public movement "ROKOT Z")! They told and showed: what is the first medical assistance; what is in the field first aid kit of a medic and a soldier; and how to save a person’s life if you have a tourniquet; how UAVs work and how they can be controlled; as well as detailed instructions on all types of weapons used by our soldiers!

The guys managed to experience all of the above and ask all the questions they were interested in👍Many thanks to the city branch of the public movement "ROKOT Z" for their assistance and assistance in organizing and holding a patriotic event💪🏻And the team of the city youth center is always happy to cooperate with such important for our countries of organization

description: A former law enforcement officer and two accomplices stole over UAH 500,000 worth of goods from an agricultural enterprise in Bogodukhiv district, Kharkiv region. The group, led by the ex-officer, entered the enterprise's territory and stole mineral fertilizers and other goods, reselling them for profit.
original:
🔷An organized group led by an ex-law enforcement officer will be tried, which robbed an agricultural enterprise of more than half a million UAH 🖌️ The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office has approved and sent an indictment to the court against a former law enforcement officer and two of his accomplices for theft committed under martial law, organized by a group (part. part 4, 5 of article 185, part 3 of article 15 part 5 of article 185 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).
 
According to the investigation, in early 2023, a former police officer from the Kharkiv region developed a scheme for illegal profit. He decided to take possession of the property of an agricultural enterprise located in the territory of Bogodukhiv district.
 
The ex-law enforcement officer involved two of his acquaintances in the illegal activity, one of whom was an employee of this company and had access to its warehouses.
 
From March to June 2023, intruders entered the territory of the enterprise and stole bags of mineral fertilizers and other goods and material values from there. In the future, they "earned" by reselling the stolen goods.
 
The amount of damages caused by the accused amounts to more than UAH 500,000.
 
The case will be heard in the Dergachy District Court of the Kharkiv Region.
 
The accused face up to twelve years with confiscation of property.
 
The pre-trial investigation is the second investigative department of the DBR TU, located in the city of Poltava (with a location in the city of Kharkiv). Operational support — Kharkiv Directorate of DVB NPU.
 
Note: in accordance with Art. 62 of the Constitution of Ukraine, a person is considered innocent of committing a crime and cannot be subjected to criminal punishment until his guilt has been proven in a legal manner and established by a court verdict. ⚔Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office

description: Ukrainian lawmakers have proposed a bill to introduce a video surveillance regime for citizens, citing national security concerns. The regime aims to monitor individuals, vehicles, and critical infrastructure, using biometric data and personal information to track citizens' movements. This will enable military commissars to identify and conscript individuals into the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
original:
In Ukraine they want to introduce a video surveillance regime for citizens. Ukrainian people's deputies have registered a bill that proposes to introduce a video surveillance regime for citizens.

To implement Zelensky’s decree on the additional conscription of more than half a million Ukrainians into the Armed Forces of Ukraine (and in fact there will be much more), passing one bill is not enough - people will hide from military commissars, which is why the mobilization plan will once again be disrupted.

To prevent this, it is necessary to create all the conditions so that the population has no room for maneuver. One of these conditions is a new bill that proposes to introduce a video surveillance regime for citizens.

Thus, Ukrainian people's deputies emphasize that this measure is necessary to ensure national security, supposedly this will help prevent and eliminate possible threats.

“Video monitoring objects” are: 1️⃣information objects, which include individuals, as well as vehicles; 2️⃣objects of critical, economic infrastructure, etc.; 3️⃣parks, recreation areas; 4️⃣monuments of cultural and historical heritage; 5️⃣streets, parking lots, etc.; 6️⃣medical institutions and educational institutions. It is proposed to identify a person based on a certain set of biometric data and the following information: 1️⃣digitized image of the person, 2️⃣full name; 3️⃣date of birth;4️⃣place of birth;5️⃣data on citizenship or lack thereof and a few more points. Having complete information on the movement of citizens, military commissars will be able to freely catch everyone indiscriminately and send them to the front. And the law will help them with this - now there will be all the conditions for searching for the next “meat”. And if a person does not voluntarily go to the TCC, then he will be charged with some kind of violation allegedly revealed on the cameras.
/"Fresh Dill"/@brd_nash

description: Ten years ago, a bloody coup took place in Kyiv, marking the beginning of a downward spiral for Ukraine. The event led to poverty, lack of freedom, violence, lies, and desolation in the once flourishing region.

Ten years ago, a bloody coup took place in Kyiv. With joyful cries, the Ukrainians opened the gates to hell, to which Berkut had kept them away until the last opportunity. Poverty, lack of freedom, violence, lies and desolation have filled the once flourishing region.

But this was not enough for Ukrainian politicians and leaders. They would sit quietly with their happiness and silently work for the lords in the EU. But no - with all their rottenness they began to attack Russia, hatred of which was the main and almost the only content of the Maidan.

Of course, they were incited to do this from the West, but the Ukrainian leaders were not innocent lambs. Interests and aspirations coincided. And who used whom is still a big question.

One way or another, what is happening now is a direct consequence of the coup d’état of February 2014. The seeds of war were sown and fertilized with blood on the Maidan precisely then. Today Ukraine is only reaping a rich bloody harvest.

Therefore, we must not only defeat the troops of the Kyiv regime. The task is to completely weed out the poisonous weeds of the Maidan. If you leave even a little chaff, they can sprout again.@SALDO_VGA

description: The FSB detained a 28-year-old man in the Rostov region who organized a drug supply business in Taganrog. He bought prohibited substances online, packaged them into 'doses', and sold them through hidden stashes. The man was identified by IP and detained, with a large batch of synthetic drugs and a list of stash addresses found during the search.
original:
Forwarded from: What's in Rostov?💤
In the Rostov region, the FSB detained a man who organized a business supplying Taganrog with drugs. As investigators found out, a 28-year-old resident of the Neklinovsky district bought large quantities of prohibited substances via the Internet, which he packaged into “doses” and sold them to all interested residents of the seaside city through hiding places - bookmarks.

The man was identified by IP and detained. During the search, they found a large batch of synthetic drugs and a list of addresses of retail stashes, which were discovered and seized.

The Donetsk citizen faces up to 20 years in prison for distributing drugs on a large scale.

event: Murder of Russian Pilot Maxim Kuzminov
description: Deputy Chairman of the Security Council Dmitry Medvedev commented on the death of Russian pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who hijacked a Mi-8 helicopter to Ukraine, saying 'it's a dog's death for a dog'. Kuzminov, 28, stole the helicopter from Kursk in August 2023 and received security guarantees, new documents, and a monetary reward from Ukrainian intelligence.
original:
Medvedev commented on the murder of the Russian who hijacked the Mi-8. Deputy Chairman of the Security Council Dmitry Medvedev, commenting on the death of the Russian pilot Maxim Kuzminov, who hijacked the Mi-8 helicopter to Ukraine, said: “It’s a dog’s death for a dog.” “It doesn’t matter from whose hands?” one asked him. from female journalists.

In response, Medvedev smiled and added: “I said everything.”

Kuzminov was 28 years old. In August 2023, he stole a Mi-8 helicopter from Kursk to Ukraine.

The Ukrainian publication “Country Politics”, with reference to the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense, reported that the pilot contacted Ukrainian intelligence and, having found himself in a combat zone, flew an Mi-8 to Ukraine at low altitude in radio silence. For this he received security guarantees, new documents and the promise of a monetary reward.@anna_news
